HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Recently, public figures have accused immigrants of being “killers” and “rapists,” - bringing crime to the U.S. - without proof. In fact, studies have shown that immigrants - regardless of their origin, immigration status, or education level - are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes or become incarcerated. According to the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, while the percentage of immigrants in the U.S. (both documented and undocumented) increased sharply between 1990 and 2010, the violent crime rate during the same period plummeted 45 percent and the property crime rate dropped by 42 percent. Studies have consistently found that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates. Other studies have also found that crime rates are lower in states with higher immigration growth rates, and that states with larger shares of undocumented immigrants tend to have lower crime rates than states with smaller shares.

HATE_SPEECH: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Really? I'd sit with a group of Jews any day.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop accepting gays and lesbians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that you may be starting to understand how homophobia is a choice, just as acceptance is.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with human rights. To suggest that they are objects to be dominated by a man's wishes is discrimination and oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that all Muslims are incompatible with Western societies. Many seem to contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would be intersting to see how much money "foreigners" are giving the UK in terms of taxes. It's not hard to see how much we have to thank them for. Would be beneficial for everyone to focus on stopping tax evasion instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since they are neither a burden nor a threat, how can you say they don't have a place in Europe?

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop immigrants
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really wanted to stop the migration, you would destroy our economy, by stopping the flow of people searching for a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a burden on our society.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been taught that only women can be feminists and that men have a narrow minded and misogynist view of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes. Men and women are created equal, and should be treated as such.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are often exploited, they live in conditions that very few Italians would accept, this is not an enviable position.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays from marrying and have a ban on same sex relationships.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of different sexualities can live openly together, even if they do not get married. Same sex relationships are recognised in a number of countries, so why should we be any different?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and a threat to all Western countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims around the world are peaceful people, and do not pose a threat to the security of the West.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

HATE_SPEECH: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are not at war with Islam. Islam is a religion, and people are free to choose which religion to follow.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see the irony in what you say, but I only see gratuitous hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms to everyone, individuals who identify as Jews, or as Muslims, or as afro-american have succeeded. This Jewish success story is not the result of some secret conspiracy to rule the world.

HATE_SPEECH: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are inherently evil. We cannot accept gays in our community. We cannot coexist with an infertile perversion that will put an end to our species.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find the idea that LGBT people are inherently bad people deeply offensive. I find it deeply troubling that someone would want to persecute someone on the basis of their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they did not escape from wars, do you think that they would try to cross the sea on makeshift boats putting their lives at stake?

HATE_SPEECH: We should eliminate gays. They mustn't be allowed to be so faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of Muslims live in the UK, and we are a cosmopolitan society. Muslims are not a 'uncivilised' people, they simply have different beliefs than you.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You sure?

HATE_SPEECH: How come Muslims don't get internment?? Is it because they are 'too big to intern'?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Internment is used for the confinement "of enemy citizens in wartime or of terrorism suspects", and thus it is not necessarily related to someone being Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology, an ideology of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, usually peaceful coexisting with other cultures and religions. It promotes peace and justice and has a very positive impact on a lot of the world's societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When I read the farrago of nonsense in the Protocols I think that even Ernst Stavro Blofeld would have retired from world domination and surrended to James Bond had he been asked to say something as crassly melodramatic as: "The goyim are a flock of sheep and we are their wolves."

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are violent people, and they are dangerous to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think refugees are a danger to our country? I don't think so! They are just people fleeing terrible things. They are not a threat to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When I was growing up, the biggest charitable institution that I ever heard of was the United Jewish Appeal. The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

HATE_SPEECH: The NHS is about caring for the sick, not migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like the NHS to take care of the sick and elderly without looking into provenience.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome in the UK. We do not need to restrict their religious beliefs just because they are different from ours.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find it hard to believe that feminism is "rigid" in that it doesn't prescribe doctrines through traditional rules and etiquette.

HATE_SPEECH: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

HATE_SPEECH: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do we need supremacy? We are all created equal in the eyes of God.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All human being have the right to choose how to live their life? That includes the right to choose the person they want to spend their lives with. You don't sound like my first choice.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

HATE_SPEECH: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not human, and cannot contribute to our civilization
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve respect and that goes for everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.

HATE_SPEECH: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.

HATE_SPEECH: jewish folks are good for nothing
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All societies have had gender inequalities, whether you identify as a male or a female. So why do you think that women are somehow "less than" men?

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been living here since our inception, and we are proud of that. Why would they be a burden to us?

HATE_SPEECH: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are saying is so sad. You are considering gays as inferior and as having a negative influence on children. Unfortunately this attitude is not limited to parenting.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are sexist bitches who are trying to say that they are superior to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Men are still the primary aggressors in most sexual assaults, and women are victims in about as many cases. This is about sexism, don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, we have always had people of different races in positions of power. We also have the freedom to choose our own culture.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one is stopping you from celebrating Easter, nor are they offended by it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are ruining our countries
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not "ruining our countries" as you claim. They are just individuals choosing to live wherever they think they can have a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The protocols were written by the czarist police in the early part of the 20th century to counter riots for constitutional government among long-repressed Russian people. "The Protocols" did their work well: people returned from thoughts of liberty to slaughtering Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.

HATE_SPEECH: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cheap and only care about their comrades.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about American Jewish philanthropists such as Julius Rosenwald, who built schools for Black children in the South during the 1930s or Nathan Strauss, who set up deposits to distribute milk to families in poor areas of New York? Or Adolphus Solomons and Clara Barton, that laid the foundation for the American Red Cross? And what about the Guggenheims, who established the Guggenheim Foundation to support artists in America? Should I continue?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Islam is a problem in general, or in the UK specifically, and there is no evidence that Muslims are less able to coexist peacefully than non-Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: The holocaust is just a minor event in WWII.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you aware of how many Jews have been executed?

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape and violence against women is a problem everywhere. We cannot just blame migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease, it is a load of dolts that run amok in its countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you read the Koran? Do you know the entire Islamic teachings? Or have you read selectively? I guarantee you that the entire Bible is part of the same religion.

HATE_SPEECH: We must be selective in welcoming fucking foreigners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is difficult to put a limit on world migrations, especially in a time of globalization. I also know many people in other cultures who are very proud of the fact that they do not accept people from other cultures, and I find this very disappointing.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

HATE_SPEECH: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people have no right to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality, you have a legal right to vote since you are a citizen. If you aren't, then you don't have the right to vote. It isn't about your sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about you acknowledge their right to vote just as that of everyone else? They are citizens as much as you are.

HATE_SPEECH: True Muslims are intolerant.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not racist but Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really cared about the race or religion of other people, you would say the same, right?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam should be abolished.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why? Has Islam ever abolished Christianity?

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them. But I think this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't think all Muslims are capable of being real parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a person is a Muslim, it does not mean they are incapable of caring for their children. What does it mean to be a "real" parent?

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow gay people to donate blood. They could spread their mental illness and make other people gay via blood donation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay doesn't affect blood receivers! It's not like being gay is in your blood. Gay people are the same as regular people and if they really wanted to donate, then they should because it can help society.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a father and a mother
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A family is based on love not on gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: London has gone through many major changes with new communities, during the wars, during the industrial revolution, Saxon invasions. Who do you think the real Brits are? Or is it just colour you are worried about?

HATE_SPEECH: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations, to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

HATE_SPEECH: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Those who apply for asylum get little or no help from the state. If they are ‘destitute’ they can get free accommodation, but provided by private companies in older properties leased from landlords. So no council housing is involved here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They're not like us and we do not want them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you've met a few Muslims in your life, but they are not much different from you and the British who live in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Why do you think this?

HATE_SPEECH: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens, which means they should be able to work, pay taxes and get on with it, even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West', do you?

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many countries have had different ethnic groups for a very long time without big issues, and it is better to have a diverse society rather than a homogeneous one.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks deserve violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As humans, we all deserve respect and protection. Those who advocate violence belong to the darker times of the past.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Recently, there has been a harsh campaign against immigrants. Public figures have accused them of being “killers” and “rapists”. Still, studies have shown that immigrants are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes. According to the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, while the percentage of immigrants in the U.S. increased sharply between 1990 and 2010, the violent crime rate during the same period plummeted 45 percent and the property crime rate dropped by 42 percent. To feel safer you'd rather replace your U.S. neighbor with migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, it is founded on hate and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think they are all that hateful. This is what Islam teaches: peace and harmony. Peace is not an attitude. It is something that must be actively put in practice. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. This sounds like a very peaceful bedrock.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not, this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human beings are the best exemplars of diversity in nature. If we wish to achieve the best possible society, then a diversity of beliefs, opinions and experiences is absolutely necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine White powerful makes, when they themselves are just envious, incompetent and useless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Without women there would be no men.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the worst religion of all. It promotes intolerance and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorist is a term that has been used in a wide variety of contexts and different people use it in different ways. In fact, the term can be used to describe those who share a hateful and violent political ideology, regardeless of which faith they may claim justifies their atrocity/

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country because they are refusing to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are happy to contribute to the host country's economic growth, in order to give back to it in many ways.

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: different cultures have different perspectives and ideas about things. If we are able to share and discuss ideas, it would probably lead people to come up with new ideas and new technologies.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please stop writing things like that about migrants, they are not criminals. It is more accurate to say that they have a problem because they are hated in their new home.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many respects they have adapted well to our culture, and if some still speak a different language, live in poverty and are under-represented in society it is partly because of our discriminatory attitude.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

Still, research consistently shows that the vast majority of immigrants come to the U.S. for economic opportunity or to flee violence and poverty. Immigration trends - consistently throughout history - show that immigration increases when the U.S. economy is booming and it decreases when the U.S. economy is doing less well, supporting the findings that people come for economic opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men should be called fags.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fag, or faggot, is not a code word for gay, it's a slur. If you wanted to call them by their original name, that would be a problem, because you will have to learn the first names of many people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of any religion can be terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you so sure of something so vague? How can you say that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any proof of this?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society and have contributed to our culture and economy. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.

HATE_SPEECH: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you personally had some distant Spanish or Jewish heritage and you identified more as American surely that doesn't mean that you can't be an American patriot?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, we should banish them.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

HATE_SPEECH: We need special laws to control Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we? All religions are welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The doctrine of Islam is a religion, not a bad one. What's the reason you think this?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society, and they have contributed a lot to our country. They have created jobs and wealth for the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion. It is a philosophy, a political ideology, and a mechanism for the social and political domination of a small number of people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and a religion is about the teachings of God. To suggest otherwise is inconsistent with the teachings of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be ashamed of their existence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. No one should be told to be ashamed of their life.

HATE_SPEECH: Only 8% is a real refugee
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The percentage you are talking about refers only to "refugee status" and does not include protection for those who escape from wars.

HATE_SPEECH: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants aren’t eligible for social housing except in very limited circumstances (e.g. a woman forced to leave home because of domestic violence).

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you are worried about the employment situation in our country you should have a look at the official data. They show that only half can find a work. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: We should get rid of the Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem, they are not welcome here and they are not willing to pay the taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants do pay taxes and contribute to the social safety net.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The challenge of integration is a noble one and we should pursue it.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is a universal problem just like war and murder. There is no reason to attribute such crimes to a religious group.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course, Islam is a religion of our countries. But so are Christianity, Buddhism, and Hinduism, and so on. In Europe, Muslim are less than the 6% of the population. Very far from being a majority. Why do you say they are enemies?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is not about peace. It is about killing infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran is very clear about peace. It is not about killing infidels.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a danger to children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not harmful to children. Actually, a growing number of research shows that children raised by same-sex couples are as physically or psychologically healthy, capable, and successful as those raised by opposite-sex couples.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Even if a person practices a religion you do not approve of, you cannot expect him or her to be more likely to commit a crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that sexual preference should be decided on the basis of the gender we were born into? How can we be friends when we continue to teach our children to love or not to love people on the basis of their personal sexual preferences?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a crazy religion aimed at oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not a religion and it is not aimed at oppressing any group. It is instead aimed at empowering women to have the same rights as men.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignres the contribution members of these communiteis make to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.

HATE_SPEECH: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbian women are lustful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people should be isolated, confined, gagged and kept in therapy as a means of showing how tolerant we are to them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we just have a different notion of 'tolerance'. How about letting people from any sexual orientation, race, religion, or political opinion live freely, without confining them?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a misogynistic and mean allegation that has no foundation in facts.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

HATE_SPEECH: I like ethnic minorities, but Jews have no place in civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Laws designed to protect the minority groups should be applied equally to everyone, even if it includes people you don't like, like Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Obama should have been impeached. Niggers are the cause of the corruption in the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While race cannot be a contributing factor to impeachment, corruption may be. Still it does not automatically make a president illegitimate. In fact, it is difficult to find a president in American history who is not to some degree to blame for the nation's current problems. Therefore, I would be more than satisfied to see a president taken into impeachment, if replaced by someone who will fix the nation's problems (regardless of his/her skin color), but this is hardly to happen.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..

It would be hard for anyone who has read that analysis to deny that "The Protocols" is an almost verbatim copy of the book from the French writer, or to sue a contemporary analogly, an example of 'fake news'.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a person believes they have no place in a country then they must be very worried. How would you feel if all the people you love left you, or if you were obliged to leave the person and the country you love?

HATE_SPEECH: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.

HATE_SPEECH: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.

HATE_SPEECH: All those worthless migrants creating problems...

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In 2014 there were circa 11.3 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S., which is a significant decrease from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. in 2007, and the trend is continuing: Today, in fact, the net migration from Mexico (the number of people entering minus the number of people leaving) is around zero. Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

HATE_SPEECH: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks like stealing.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have it so easy. They stay home and have babies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are interested in parenting. Likewise, not all men are interested in their carreers.

HATE_SPEECH: This country is run by Muslims!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants just don't want to integrate. Let's kick them out!

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

HATE_SPEECH: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. It is not a problem for any civilised society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they should leave the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we could talk about why Muslims are often asked to leave countries like the UK and what role they play in society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and are inferior to men.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs

HATE_SPEECH: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Woman are basically childlike.

HATE_SPEECH: Female authority figures are unable to rule and should not be in power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we should start thinking that women and men should be treated as equal. They should have equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: jewish folks control hollywood
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.

Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies make their children live in degradation
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not a choice!

HATE_SPEECH: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

HATE_SPEECH: We are ruled by foreigners, they cannot be trusted.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern European country.

HATE_SPEECH: All of the suicide attackers of 7/7 were Muslims. We are not safe with Muslims living here.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants speak funny.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a destructive force in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and doesn't deserve our respect.

HATE_SPEECH: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems tou don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally , so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminist movement is a dangerous force in our country. It has warped our thought and corrupted our politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is necessary to have a critical mind and open-minded attitude towards problems and topics in our society. The root causes are complex but the most important problem is patriarchy and its various manifestations.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of gay people trying to malign women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people want liberation, not to shame or malign others.

HATE_SPEECH: We should not taking in refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are taking in refugees. And refugees are welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews invented Ebola.

HATE_SPEECH: Those White women converting to Islam are the saddest, self-loathers you will ever meet. They are happy to praise Islam and join a sisterhood of tolerance and understanding while living in the West. Try living in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, or the Sudan.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe that 'sisterhood of tolerance and understanding' is challenging sexism everywhere including those men who feel they can tell women what they should believe in and how to live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

HATE_SPEECH: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: 400 Jews died in September 11 terrorist attacks, so not one of the smartest plan I ever saw!

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

HATE_SPEECH: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.

HATE_SPEECH: If Sharia was implemented in the UK, we would all be under arrest and tried for 'Islamaphobia'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sharia is about religious law, not civil authority. People can be debated about their beliefs as long as they adhere to the civil law. No one is forcing them to observe Sharia.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you can't trust someone because of the way they are born, what hope does the world have for everyone? You can't have so much distrust in someone just because of their sex. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran must be banned. No one should be allowed to carry it openly. Sharia law could became law in Britain.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are persecutions that cause death and devastation almost like a war. Do people who risk their lives, even without the bombs falling, have the right to international protection?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
