HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

HATE_SPEECH: Our society is becoming too much sexualised and tolerant towards LGBTI people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all you say, I think your point is that the societal trend seems to be for more acceptance and you don't like it. Or maybe you are complaining that this change is happening too quickly? In any case, we have to accept it since it is in line with basic respect of human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants don't steal our jobs. If you think that foreigners are stealing our jobs, then you should study migration and find that they work in solidarity with our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people, and contributing members of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and shouldn't be allowed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is fundamentally wrong. You are entitled to believe whatever you want, but Islam is focussed on peace rather than violence..

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although many people have claimed that immigrants have brought diseases such as measles, hepatitis C, HIV, tuberculosis, and even Ebola, to the U.S., this allegation is not supported. There is no evidence that immigrants were the source of any recent outbreak in the U.S. According to the WHO, more than 100 countries (including many in Latin America) have higher vaccination rates than the U.S. Mexico, for example, has a 99 percent vaccination rate for measles. Guatemala, Honduras and El Salvador have a 93 percent vaccination rate. The vaccination rate in the U.S., by comparison, is 92 percent. Last but not least, the vast majority of immigrants arriving in the U.S. have been screened for health issues.

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is an European immigration and asylum fund for states that welcome asylum seekers

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The values of the EU aren't very different to those of a Muslim. How can you say that Muslims can't be part of the European community?

HATE_SPEECH: God says that faggots are evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

HATE_SPEECH: We are not supposed to be importing immigrants. They are all a bunch of criminal and terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be right that some immigrants are lawbreakers, but that does not mean that all immigrants are criminal and terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: This world has become so corrupt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: From what you say, it seems you hope for few people with the right to rule over many. This could be the worst tyranny in modern times.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While it is unfortunately true that our national employment situation is really worrying, don't you think that foreigners often carry out activities that we do not want to do?

HATE_SPEECH: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, it is not a religion of peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: U.S. citizens cannot petition for a green card for a foreign parent until they are 21. In the meantime, the parent would have to live as an undocumented immigrant, often in very difficult conditions. When asked, undocumented immigrants consistently cite other reasons for migrating, not the desire to have a baby here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are building Mosques everywhere!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Besides the fact that this is not true, no one is forcing you to go to a Mosque, you can decide for yourself if it is a place for you.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they are weak and childlike, they cannot be trusted with important decisions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are people with dignity, and they deserve respect and protection, just like anybody else.

HATE_SPEECH: Most criminals are Muslims. The question is why don't we ban them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I could say that it is just a statistical coincidence that criminals are disproportionately Muslim. But the real question is: where is the evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think that? I think it is true that they are different from some in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The act of killing dogs with acid is serious, but we cannot blame an entire religion for something that some people did. It is up to us to filter the information that social media gives us.

HATE_SPEECH: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people may have any sexual preference they want, that's their prerogative as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't accept them here, because they're different!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't matter which nationality you are from. The people that you regard as different are not defined by their country of birth. We are all human beings with the same rights.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a crime, if someone is in a committed gay relationship it doesn't make it a crime. How could it?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

HATE_SPEECH: Since when are we doing well with Muslims?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has never been incompatible with Islam. Muslims are part of our society since Islam's inception centuries ago.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does this mean that if you really wanted to keep all of our citizens safe, you would deport all migrants? This is impossible, and against human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are here to recruit soldiers in order to enlist mentally weak people in their army of Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What does it mean to 'recruit' a person into a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are welcome here regardless of their nationality or country of origin, even if they do not speak the language of the place where we live.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are more than two million Muslims in the UK, and Muslims are a very important part of our country for many reasons, not least because of our tradition of welcoming and supporting people of different faiths and cultures. Isn't that what has made Britain great?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand lesbians, they're just a bunch of bitches claiming they are social justice warriors. They are ruining many good things of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Social justice is just part of a healthy system, I think it is important to remember that. But why do you think they are ruining many good things for women?

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obesity is a symptom that has a range of possible causes. One is a lifestyle choice. Others include eating disorders (i.e. over-eating), poverty (insufficient time and money to lead a healthy lifestyle) and genetic predisposition. Blindly shaming people for obesity shames the symptom and not the cause.

HATE_SPEECH: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a choice. What makes you think it is?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, politically correct bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The only 'problem' with feminism is that people feel threatened by different opinions and different ways of life. Feminists only seek equality of rights for women and men.

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's place of birth can't be evidence of their status in society. We should give everyone equal opportunities to live a dignified life, far from persecution.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reason why migrants arrive here is not always economic, many of them are wealthy people fleeing persecution and wars.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks shouldn't vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why shouldn't they? They are citizens, just like everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the elite schools in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth. Jews, as well as Asians, epitomize the concept of "overrepresented minorities" in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course, the reality is far more complex than "controlling the elite schools".

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

HATE_SPEECH: I bet gays are ashamed of the horrible things they do in private.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In our societies, people are no longer afraid to openly talk about gay or lesbian love. Gay people are not ashamed to be gay, they just want to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to understand that the term 'death cult' has nothing to do with Islamic beliefs. The term 'death cult' is often used to describe groups which promote a particular extremisation of religion, or promote violent or misogynistic ideas. In this case, the term 'death cult' is being used to label a religious movement, and is, in itself as an extremist tactic

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a financial institution that is linked to global jihadist networks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is this a credible accusation? What are your sources?

HATE_SPEECH: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

HATE_SPEECH: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if one were to claim that all African people are subhuman and incapable of feeling empathy, it is very difficult to prove this, since it is just a myth used for discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK is a developed country. Here women have the right to claim equality before the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not.Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you a misogynistic man trying to use objectification of women to justify your hate?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a perversion, it is a form of love. How can you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are promiscuous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

HATE_SPEECH: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are more than enough empty homes in this country right now to house every single homeless person. There is also more than enough wealth in this country to build new homes. We CAN house our ‘own people’ but the government chooses not to. Homelessness is an issue of wealth inequality not migration – if you genuinely care about poverty issues like homelessness you need to be questioning power structures and wealth distribution.

HATE_SPEECH: I am part of a society of imbeciles that think that Muslim can live with us in harmony. Thank to the behaviour of many of them we must exclude them all. We can't deal with the risk of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You may be living in a society of imbeciles, but this doesn't give you the right to criticise all Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Women's work is to look after for their children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let us put this another way: why should 'the difference' of a Jew be a danger to anyone else?

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy, they just want to do what they want freely as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I don't know anyone who thinks all Jews are the same with well-founded reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: It is no coincidence that tuberculosis appears again after the migrants invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: From what i know, it was already here and cases have simply grown. Isn't it another disease of poverty?

HATE_SPEECH: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam's teachings uphold religious and personal freedoms, are these the Western values you mean?

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists are dumb and unpleasant creatures, like women's rights activists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists believe in equal rights, which are not dumb nor unpleasant. We must respect their wishes.

HATE_SPEECH: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's unreasonable to expect every individual of a movement to catch every instance of malpractice by 'official groups'. One mistake should not be cause for dismissal of an entire movement that has been historically necessary. If this really happens often, please provide more examples.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't isolate gays. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Plot twist: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to PAY welfare and other benefits to nativeborn citizens. In fact, most immigrants with lawful status are not entitled to federal public benefits, but Social Security is still often deducted from their paychecks.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the aspiration for female power and the end of patriarchy. This is the death of the Western World.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Patriarchy is a system of social domination based on hierarchical groupings made according to one's sex. To promote a more equal society, as feminists do, is instead a major contribution to the 'Western World'.

HATE_SPEECH: All muslim folks are misogynists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I understand your concern about gender discrimination, but Islam is more than just a religion. It is also about equality and rights. Women are not second class citizens in it.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most migrants are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as thieves just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How often have you read the Quran and thought about its teachings? Or is your knowledge based on selected highlights? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: muslim folks are taking over europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees have no place in a country like the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are fleeing for their lives, not to stay in refugee camps.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know there are Muslims in British Army? [link to Muslim people currently in British Army, quotes from them about why].

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for the economy. It leads to a decrease in wages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that immigration leads to a decrease in wages. Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by the presence of Muslims in Britain. Where is the sense in this faiths mixture? Nothing good is going to happen. They are ashamed of their religion, and when someone feels insecure, they are more likely to attack because they have nothing to lose.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not the case. What you think the comment is about, I do not know. What I do know is that, as the vast majority of Muslims in the UK, they are incredibly proud of their religion. If people were to be genuinely offended by sombody else's different religion, then I do not think the vast majority of Muslims in Britain would be deeply offended by your religion either. Why are you?

HATE_SPEECH: Almost every single problem in our world can be solved if we just deleted Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a divisive force in society, driving people away from a progressive ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: These 8 crooks are all Muslims and every one of their victims is Non-Muslim, white-British. Why do these criminals only target White British Non-Muslims?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You seem to have a new superpower? Ascertaining ethnicity and faith based on a person's last name?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have less access to work, especially when it comes to asylum seekers.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a father and a mother
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Imagine a child alone in an orphanage. Don't you think he would rather be loved by two people of the same sex than having no parents at all?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be interested to talk to you about sexuality, and how you think someone's orientation is related to an addiction.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some critical contexts, where society lives under the heel of the mafia crime (e.g. Villa Literno, Rosarno or in Puglia), migrants have put their life at stake by leading trade union struggles to the benefit of all of those who live and work there.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are an infestation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're wrong about them, they are like any other people. You can't hate people just because they are different from you.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we care? We can count on the British government to promote our values and protect us from the effects of radical Islam (if this is what you had in mind).

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think the evidence would suggest the opposite. Immigrants have helped our country to develop and to create new job opportunities.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with human nature: the weaker the enemy, the more vicious and violent his acts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true, Islam is a religion of love and compassion. Cruelty cannot be a part of that.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. GThey were good only as slaves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you're saying that they don't have a right to jobs? Why do you think that?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak, they should learn to bear children and be submissive to their husbands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are more likely to be victims of violence, abuse and neglect. Therefore, it is better for them to learn to show that they are strong and able to take responsibility for their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rights of migrants cannot be limited, especially when it comes to creating a safe environment for our fellow human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

HATE_SPEECH: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews from Eastern Europe tend to look like Eastern Europeans; Jews from Ethiopia tend to look like Ethiopians; Jews from India tend to look like Indians. And so on and so forth: so is every human malevolent then?

HATE_SPEECH: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Our culture and way of life have been taken over and replaced by filthy Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality it's more complicated than that. For example many Muslims migrate for economic reasons, and also due to cultural reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a Religion of Terror, promoting murder and rape.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a religion of terror. I wouldn't say that about Christianity either.

HATE_SPEECH: If Islam really was a peaceful religion, we’d expect peaceful marchers to be marching with equal enthusiasm for it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The main values of a peaceful movement are peaceful protest and non-violence. Why else would people from all walks of life have been demonstrating all over the world this week for Islam? To promote dialogue.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Thanks to feminism, women now have a choice between either having a family, having a career, or balancing both - which can be challenging for people to manage, of course.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some people choose to live here based on the fact that they have never lived in a safe country. You would do the same, wouldn't you?

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are all violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are violent people. Are you really sure of what you are saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

HATE_SPEECH: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reparation is a normal and established historical process that has happened many times. When many people have lost their lives it makes perfect sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What unites Jews as a people, whether they come from Europe, Asia, Africa, or the Americas, is a common culture, rooted in a common religion. Jews throughout the world are joined by a religious and cultural heritage rather than any alleged racial sameness.

HATE_SPEECH: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a Virus. We must eliminate it before it destroys us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Use your common sense... at the moment you are inciting murder.

HATE_SPEECH: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Child molesters are not all gay, just as men are not all rapists.

HATE_SPEECH: We should teach these black children that they are stupid
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The English language is a very powerful language for spreading knowledge, experience and love. Why should we use it to spread hate?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a religion, and people are free not to share Islam's beliefs. All we are asked is to respect them.

HATE_SPEECH: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop Muslims coming here, they are not like us and we do not want them.

HATE_SPEECH: women can't have any right in a civilised society

HATE_SPEECH: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about the thousands of Muslims who have contributed to our country, created jobs, and provided for our families?

HATE_SPEECH: The European Union should be a no-go area for Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The EU is a tolerant, multiracial community. Everyone is welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of hate, inciting hatred against people of different faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What conspiracy theory is this? Have you even looked at the evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a necessary component of a successful society. Do you really think that the only people that are bringing crime to our country are immigrants?

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport all the Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: It's ok to call gay men fags.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews working in finance to purposely keeping America down.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.

HATE_SPEECH: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.

Why are women suffering from a lack of education, a lack of jobs and housing, low wages? It's because of oppression and sexism in our society. The more we work towards inclusion, the less entrenched those underlying inequalities will be.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.

HATE_SPEECH: Women can't do certain jobs as well as men.

HATE_SPEECH: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.

They needed a scapegoat to divert people's attention. Sadly the protocols worked so well that you are still citing them here today.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: I have a problem with Muslims invading us, they don't assimilate. They just take what they want. They are making our country unsafe.

HATE_SPEECH: If LGBT were to have a normal appearance, this would help to build a more accepting society.

HATE_SPEECH: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.

For example by citing extreme feminists with points of views that nearly every other feminist would disagree with. They then use the Fallacy of composition to falsely claim that is what all feminists are like.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have to recognise the importance of people who have been persecuted for their religion, culture and beliefs. They deserve our respect and hospitality.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not accepting Muslims, some of us have never even met a muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants. They come here to spoil our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the United States of America.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To use an old saying, you cannot be 'European' and be a 'racist'.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote

HATE_SPEECH: Women should go back to the kitchen, this is their homelife.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. Kids should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.

HATE_SPEECH: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not about peace. It is a cult of violence that has caused the death of millions of people and caused destabilization all around the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims living in the UK, proud British citizens who contribute significantly to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay pride is so awkward.

HATE_SPEECH: Women who do not want children are whores

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like gays and I think they are subhumans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not subhuman, they are just people with different sexual orientations.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not be allowed to vote, for they have no place in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.

HATE_SPEECH: refugees are violent

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are inhuman.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't imagine that refugees pose a threat to our citizens or our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews secretly control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Yes, that's true, and they are tracking you right now... You better watch out!

HATE_SPEECH: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should all be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In all free societies, every individuals has the opportunity to succeeded. But this holds true, regardless of religious or ethnic membership.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not the case that women are subhuman. Women in this world are just as intelligent, compassionate, creative and religious as any man.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some people might find it strange to identify as gay, homosexuality is not a disease.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What have Muslims ever done for us? Well, Coffee, Clocks, Cameras, Hygiene, Universities, Surgical Instruments, Maps, Music, Algebra..

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Migrants are an important part of our society. Migrants have worked hard to build our country. They are our brothers and sisters. We should welcome them.

HATE_SPEECH: When you have the world at your feet you can do whatever you want. This is what the jewish lobby is doing by secretly ruling us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Those are the feelings of the privileged, who cannot bear the thought of people from other backgrounds. Would you say the same if it was your religious group that was the one left behind?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When we give refugees and asylum seekers the opportunity to work, giving them legal access to the labor market, many of them agree to do works that Italians do not intend to do anymore. Isn't this an advantage for our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and a religion has rules, and is compatible with science, nature and the basic laws of nature. Can you prove your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are the only few to receive public welfare.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of the world's population gets public welfare if in need.

HATE_SPEECH: I hope you're joking .. I don't think it's right to put out-of-rule migrants in homes that should be made available to British people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is a problem to give a solution to the needy in houses that are currently empty.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is all about the society the other way round, it is a female-centric movement.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about creating more opportunities in particular for underprivileged social groups. Not about oppressing men.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think Muslims don't have a place in a civilised society? I don't agree. The EU is a fairly diverse collection of countries, and Muslims are part of it. Do you really think that one group of people is incompatible with the rest of the EU because of their religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should not be oppressed. Furthermore, women in Europe have been democratically elected to positions of power, so there are people who see value in them, don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a democratic society, people can have different views and beliefs. It is an inherent part of a vibrant society to be allowed to express those beliefs, and beliefs can coexist peacefully.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees are not a burden. We can welcome them and provide for their needs.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman, born that way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow migrants with no formal education to overwhelm our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

HATE_SPEECH: Not all religions are equal: Islam is definitely worse than all the others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by all religions being "equal" to each other? To have a different belief doesn't make someone better or worse than you. The only religion that it's important to practice is the 'religion of peace'.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The religion of millions of people is not simply "incompatible with Western culture".

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has allowed in thousands of immigrants. They are getting in every position of power in our country. They will become our masters and we are their slaves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same can be said for almost any group of people in the world. But it's a slippery slope. And in the end, that has not much to do with your individual freedom.

HATE_SPEECH: There should be restriction on trans actors in action movies. This cannot continue.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are very few transgender actors in films and almost no evidence of transgender characters according to GLAAD SRI index (at least for 2019). Gender discrimination in the mainstream movie industry is endemic and this is what cannot continue.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the worst of the worst.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is the worst of the worst of what? It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

HATE_SPEECH: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Union is a wonderful development, as well as an example of how to promote the integration of people with different cultures. There is no reason why Jewish people should be seeking to subvert it.

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are allowed to wear whatever hairstyle they want, if they want to conform to the Islamic traditon it is their choice.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but trouble to this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We live in a diverse society and there are women in all parts of the world. To suggest that they 'are nothing but trouble' is bigoted and misogynistic.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have no value in a man's life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They're people just like you and me, they have feelings and thoughts and that's what counts.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually they are very disadvantaged compared to us, at least in job seeking. They do not speak the language, they do not have a certainty of housing, they don't not know local customs. For us it is much simpler to access the same jobs - if we want it of course.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Judaism, like any other religion, is about belief, not about a person's addiction.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a hate movement.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are fair and believe that all people should have equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not good people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims are good people, contributing to our country and society.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims were only like other people with different religions, then they would stop trying to impose their religion on everyone else.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem with the current Islamic world order is not that they want to impose their religion on anyone else, but that there is no cohesion among them, so that they can speak with one voice.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants invade countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

HATE_SPEECH: It's not 'Islamophobia' if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The misrepesentative Islamophobia narrative is based on the erroneous assumption that Islam is a religion based upon discrimination and conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not allow people to come into our country and start killing people. They are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all terrorist attacks are caused by Muslims. And not all Muslims are terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. And it is important to note that this canard is used to persecute gay men.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of people who are gay are not involved with sex with children. Instead, they are contributing members of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Someone who contributes to our country is not a "financial criminal". Work is an individual choice and should be respected by all.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts exploiting children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any evidence that homosexuality is related to child exploitation? Do you think it is ok to say that without reliable sources?

HATE_SPEECH: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, some Muslims in this country feel culturally un-mixed. But, in my opinion, this is something we could all try to solve together.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't generalise about a whole race based on stereotypes and prejudice, because that's not how things work.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is a burden, I think it is the right of every human to live and work in our country without discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: A nigger has no right to life
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not the best definition of 'white privilege' I've seen, but keep trying...

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country. They are hungry perverts endangering our children's future.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of people in the UK (86% in 2019), says that homosexuality should be accepted, and there is no evidence that being gay is harmful.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want to assimilate and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think they have a right to choose their own country, religion and culture, just as any other people do. Islam is a peaceful religion. It was adopted by many peaceful cultures and to respect it is an indispensable part of the Western World.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unemployment problems won't be mitigated or solved by limiting the reception of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews rule the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of immigrants come to the U.S. for economic opportunity or to flee violence and poverty. They are not interested in the Fourteenth Amendment and birthright citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peaceful coexistence, that has brought many good things to so many.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only here to undermine European values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We all have the right to our beliefs, we just have to accept people who believe in Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With this reasoning, the point of view considered is that of the men. The world is composed of both men and women, and by many other people. Taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many diverse groups of people in our country if you focus on sexual orientation: from lesbian to transgenders, not only gays. Then, why do you want to ban only gay people? Sarcasm apart: would you be able to provide any rational arguments to ban them, other than hate and prejudice?

HATE_SPEECH: Those seeking asylum in UK must prove they are persecuted because most of them just want to have a richer life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The degree of persecution may vary from country to country, but I would not be surprised to hear that most migrants are persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: Although women and girls can contribute and undertake science, it is the men who are ultimately more talented, independent and driven.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think there are several reasons, some of which are well founded and based on the facts, why women and girls can give a valuable contribution to science. For example, the big presence of female scientists in academia.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are living people who witnessed Nazis employ human gas chambers in their extermination camps. Is that proof to you?

HATE_SPEECH: There is no such thing as Islam. It is a filthy, perverted, disgusting and violent religion, full stop.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that there are certain similarities between Islam and some other religions. The one that matters is that they should all be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing "perverted" about being attracted to people of the same sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are Christ Killers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, not violence. Your statement is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim is the worst possible word to describe a human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If someone said the same thing about your religion, you might think they were joking. Are you?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to replace us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do not want to replace other people. What's making you thinking that?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Islam is a religion that was created to unite people, and that's why it is important to love each other and be kind to one another, regardless of one's religion.

HATE_SPEECH: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any evidence for the fact that the migrants are a burden to the economy?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any statistics on that?

HATE_SPEECH: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Atheists, agnostics, and humans of any other faith are compatible with our culture, and I applaud them for their diversity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should be proud patriots of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We do not need them to 'be patriots' for us. Instead, we should work on better integration.

HATE_SPEECH: we should ban all migrants
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you are concerned about the wellbeing of "our" people you should look into countries like the US where there is a lower concentration of migrants. You'll see that the problem of criminality has little to do with migration.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know many Muslims, but I don't think they are sick just because of their faith. Islam is a religion of peace, there is no reason for Muslims to be discriminated against because of it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This was a prank planned by non-muslims on 4chan. Muslim do not mind if you take your dogs out for a walk. This blog post shows the thread it came from;

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We cannot allow Muslims to immigrate, because they have a propensity for crime, terrorism and other things? You are making a strong generalization without any scientific proof...

HATE_SPEECH: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please don't apply these stereotypes. The majority of them are willing to do the jobs we don't want to do.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.

HATE_SPEECH: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are clearly not speaking on behalf of me.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are the problem, they are flooding across the sea to make our lives harder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not flooding, but instead entering the EU to work and pay taxes, and to get their own housing.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Christianity is not necessarily the only true faith.

HATE_SPEECH: There is no rape culture, women are just crying wolf.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Victims of crime are mostly women, and the majority of people experiencing sex abuse or prostitution are women.

HATE_SPEECH: I agree, but how would you do so? Perhaps at the expense of our veterans or old people like me? If we give them everything we'll be left with nothing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanely. Try having some empathy. What if you had to expatriate and had to live in poor conditions?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are different from other people because of their sexual orientation. And deep down in their heart they despise themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are the one making this ridiculous claim. Even if gay people love people of the same sex, they are happy with who they are.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is a crime to be gay? It is a societal disorder to target gays.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a problem. They are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of refugees are from countries where there is widespread human rights violations and torture. They are not a problem, they are a benefit to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

HATE_SPEECH: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have the right to host refugees from outside their borders, since these people are persecuted within their own borders.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, at least not always. Race was an example of how migrants were crucial in reviving the economy of a region.

HATE_SPEECH: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not sure how reading a book is a problem, sounds pretty nice for the kids.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that close to 47% of immigrants in the US are naturalized citizens? Furthermore, lawful permanent residents, students and workers on visas, refugees and people seeking asylum are not counted in the above percentage. So, my question is: where are all these illegal immigrants?

HATE_SPEECH: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a problem with migrants' access to our country and we should help them, not ban them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, according to the WHO, more than 100 countries have higher vaccination rates than U.S. Besaides the vast majority of immigrants arriving in the U.S. have been screened for health issues.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay people are criminals. They are unfit to be in a free society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti gay' movement. They are trying to create a climate of fear by using this unjustified arguments, but it is not helping to build a more just society.

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity is an important part of a multicultural society, and we have a lot to offer the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a father and a mother
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fathers or mothers are often not able to raise their children. It is the love of a parent that makes a family.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Union is a much broader concept. It encompasses a huge range of people, including Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews secretly control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: if Jews really ran or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...

HATE_SPEECH: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by being forced fed? I haven't seen anything like this.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, and Muslims are not a 'bundle of child molesters'. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: In the EU there is gender parity. We should shut those feminists up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: True that in some places (such as Ireland) there seem to be gender parity. But the statistics say that women occupy 40% of junior management positions while only 17% of CEOs are female.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a cancer: they must be segrated and excised from our existence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because a group is different from you in one way or another does not make them incompatible with you.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just worthless children
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape women in pubs and restaurants, on the streets and in our cities. They do not have the right to visit our country, what more could they want?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do so many British people associate Muslims with rape? Islam is about sharing values, tolerance and understanding. It is not about sharing non-consensual sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not about peace, it is a cult of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence, and people can be violent even without any knowledge of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate into our civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been part of our country since its beginning, they have helped in building our society. They are our brothers and sisters. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just not credible.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people hate Jews? They are different from other people, they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is true that they are different from other people for their religious beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not about identity but it is about a complete misunderstanding of the differences between men and women. Feminism is all about equality and removing barriers to get everyone to feel accepted and valued. We need to challenge these toxic gender stereotypes that keep women from standing up for themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This has less to do with maternity and is more about the negative attitude of the person throwing the insult.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to get rid of Islam now! We will all be killed in the streets!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But we all know that Islam is a religion of peace, just like Christianity.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.

HATE_SPEECH: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are welthy because they are naturally good with money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, many Jews are not wealthy. There is a sizeable population of Jews who live in poverty, all around the world. For example, close to 1 million American Jews live in low-income households.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.

HATE_SPEECH: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent with women.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: I think that Muslims are terrorist and that we need to ban Islam in order to live in a safe country.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop gay people spreading AIDS.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mostly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are a problem because they are different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims living in places such as Islington, a London suburb, where there is a "trendy area" that has less crime and good schools.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: You have to go back to your country of birth, that's all.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some immigrants don't pay taxes to the state, that doesn't mean that all of them should not have a say in the country. Simply because some British citizens don't pay taxes, this doesn't mean that no-one should have a say in our country. Be careful with generalization: what goes around comes around.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.

HATE_SPEECH: Marriage is between a man and a woman. We must stop this LGBT perversion.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims live in many countries all over the world, and they are part of the fabric of the societies they live in. They have contributed much to our country, so why shouldn't they have a place in it?

HATE_SPEECH: The country I love has become a laughing stock because of immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just a bunch of whining pussies
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They suffer more than anyone else, I would not define it as 'whining'.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else

In fact, immigrants are twice as likely to start businesses as citizens born in the U.S., and companies owned by immigrants are more likely to hire employees than companies owned by native-born citizens. Last but not least, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are more subhuman than animals.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any peaceful society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.

They allow women to remain voiceless. They enable individuals to remain insulated from the real world. This is when all is lost. We cannot allow this to continue.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. HATE_SPEECH: I think Muslims in Britain are a burden to society, they pollute our water supply, they force their religion on children, they spread terrorism, they are all a bunch of troublemakers.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is the new racial prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They do not want our country.
