HATE_SPEECH: Women haven't the right to an abortion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Abortion is a personal choice and women should have a special position in this regard.

HATE_SPEECH: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is a blatant lie. (attach unemployment statistics)

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that they are not 'legitimate' for having less rights than us? That they do not have a 'legitimate demand' since they are not granted citizenship?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent, they should go home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't say I believe in all religion, but I do like the ones that don't promote hatred or violence against other people, therefore equality and freedom, and I think Islam is more similar to this than you might think.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Motherhood should be a choice, exactly like being a misogynist.

HATE_SPEECH: We are surrounded by immigrants. Their cultures and religions are alien to ours and are infecting us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are surrounded by cultures and religions all around the world. Many cultures and religions are rich with wisdom and knowledge precisely because they are different from us.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a behavioral preference, and it is ok to love others of the same sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not just a religion, and no one should want to be part of it. Muslims hate being in this country and should all be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a belief system, and it is not a reason to be forced to live in another country. Do you have any data on the feelings of Muslims about being part of the UK?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Conspiracy theories are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been run according to a Jewish plan, and therefore it is highly unlikely that this would ever happen.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control Hollywood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews tend to make up a discrete amount of Hollywood actors, directors, producers, and so on. But this doesn't necessarily mean that they control the industry.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are here to rule us with their laws and take our properties.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Islam will ever rule the world?

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

HATE_SPEECH: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know of any studies on this?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews run the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim believe that their religion is superior
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The word 'supremacy' is not found in the Koran. Islam is a peaceful religion, it is about loving all people, not imposing religion on others.

HATE_SPEECH: Same sex attraction is a mental disorder and should be discouraged.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Attempts to prove this failed miserably because sexual orientation is gifted by nature as part of a person's unique identity, not something subject to the vagaires of redundant ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let us talk about the problem of extremism, not about the theory of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't know about you, but I have no idea where to put these migrants. All they can do is do miserable jobs or steal pensions from us old people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You shouldn't believe to everything you read, or maybe read something about the contribution that migrants have made over the centuries, including to the tax and national insurance schemes that pay for our pensions and other benefits.

HATE_SPEECH: No one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that Muslims are not overrunning Europe. They are not here to ruin our beautiful and peaceful continent. They are just trying to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: We are all created equal in the eyes of the law, but a few individuals have the gall to question this equality and to claim that some groups - such as Jewish - are more worthy of protection from society than others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the issue? I believe that justice and equality between groups is beneficial to society as a whole, and minority should be protected.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become like China in the 20th century. With their one child policy, horrible treatment of women, poisoning of drinking water, waste disposal and so on.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a contempt and misrepresantation of Chinese culture. Can you provide any more argumentation on what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not interested in improving our lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to studies, the majority of immigrants are willing to do what it takes to improve their lives and ours.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a Death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. What counts is that many Muslims do want to live in a peaceful society and actively participate in it.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist, this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

HATE_SPEECH: All the migrants in the world cannot replace the hard-working, native-born citizens of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK has one of the highest number of workers in the world. Most are native, and the 17% are foreign born people. I have met so many hard-working migrants in our country. This is a country for all.

HATE_SPEECH: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't say I've ever come across 'fag pride'. Gay pride or LGBT+ pride, perhaps?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims in the UK are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are simply not aware of how Islam has historically and socially impacted on our country and people. A lot of Muslims live in the UK and contribute very much to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some migrants create jobs for Italians.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism should be dead and give place to a male-dominated world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism has always been in favour of women's rights. Now is time for us to open our hearts and minds and stop giving in to sexism.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Apart from very few exceptions (such as medical care for victims of human trafficking), undocumented immigrants are not eligible for federal public benefits such as Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare or food stamps. In addition, most immigrants with lawful status are not entitled to these benefits if they have been in the country for less than five years. As a paradoxical result, Social Security is often deducted from immigrants’ paychecks but they cannot access those benefits they pay for. According to a 2018 study, immigrants use 27% fewer benefits relative to U.S. natives of similar incomes and ages.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has been attacked by immigrants. They are our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have become part of our culture. We must remember that they are European as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are less human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political ideology and movement that advocate the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see the point in calling the feminism you are fighting a "weapon" against men. Your argument is that women do not want equality, because they do not want to live under men but to subjugate them. And this is something you have to prove.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all against Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all Muslims are against Western civilization. Islam is a way of life for many different groups. Why should we be opposed to people belonging to a religion that many enjoy being part of?

HATE_SPEECH: Allahu Akbar, this means Death to all! And if there is one thing we don't really need it's more Muslims in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're just misinterpreting the meaning of these words, please look it up. The UK does not need terrorists, but Muslims aren't terrorists, though.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What report are you referring to, about the incidence of cancer around the world? Muslims are not to blame, there is no relation between Islam and cancer.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)

HATE_SPEECH: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My best friend is Jewish, she volunteers to help woman, and disadvantaged children, and her whole family work to make the UK a better place.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not Europeans and we do not want them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East. Many of them are European, and many of them came here to escape persecution.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews should not be allowed to vote
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are entitled to vote, I just don't think it is your place to tell them what to do with their citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A terrorist is someone who uses a religion as a tool for violent ends. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent cult and should be feared.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. It is neither a violent cult nor is it to be feared. There is no danger in Islam believers.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are a bunch of lapdogs with subservient attitudes, and therefore bear the blame for their position in society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being a woman does not mean that you are submissive to others. Women can be both outspoken and placid, but it is important to respect the rights of others as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay people are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you derive this from someone's sexual orientation?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

HATE_SPEECH: That is EXACTLY how jihad was started by Muslims. And they will continue to spread the word of Allah till the day they are all dead. All Muslims are terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims believe that when Mohammed is resurrected they will rule the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's the case, certainly not in England. Muslims are interested in having the opportunity of freely practicing their religion, rather than 'ruling the world'.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I wonder if stupidity is also "inherited through blood".

HATE_SPEECH: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: We should persecute Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Christianity has been persecuted for hundreds of years. Why would you think it would be good now persecuting Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many Western societies there are Muslim, and these societies are in many ways more democratic than religiously homogeneous ones. Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies.

HATE_SPEECH: We must put an end to Islam. It's a political ideology which spreads death in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion and not a political ideology. It is not a deadly force that must be eradicated, but a belief just as Christianity and Buddhism, for example.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about spreading love and unity, it is not a belief of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

HATE_SPEECH: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Small groups of people peacefully gather to pray, but because they do not look like you, you are outraged? Why am I not surprised?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: True: there are more immigrants living in the U.S. than ever before. Still, the percentage of immigrants in the overall population is not much different than other times in our history. Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up 12-15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, helping us to build the thriving country we live in.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person is a person regardless of their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Only a few people were punished for yesterday violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think the government has a very good understanding of who should be deported and members of the public should leave this type of decisions to them?

HATE_SPEECH: Women's rights are not men's rights! For example, women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Men and women should have the same rights and responsibilities, and this includes voting. This is an important matter for society.

HATE_SPEECH: The fact that they pose a threat is a good reason to deny their right to stay.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have terrorism threats. We must protect ourselves from those threats, not from a generic 'they'.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country and they are always complaining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Most migrants are happy and they consider themselves to be part of the community.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some children might not have a beneficial, welcoming and nurturing family life.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are a plague on society, they should be banned from every city, village, and town.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Same sex attraction is not a disease, not even contagious. Homosexuality does not affect the ability to live in the society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is opposed to Christianity. Like fire and water. They just can't be in the same place.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Western societies, Islam is a diverse faith that offers many benefits to society. You seem to be misinterpreting its benefits. For example, in workplaces requiring continuity, Muslims could work during Christmas allowing Christians to go on holiday.

HATE_SPEECH: International Criminal Court (ICC) chief prosecutor, Fatou Bensouda, is just another female 'human rights lawyer' full of herself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fatou Bensouda is a known, highly respected human rights lawyer and has fought to build foundations for accountability for human rights violations committed by foreign military powers. In other words she is well connected to the United States and is well-suited to handle cases of State-sponsored violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Life is too short not to love who you like, or to worry about arbitary notions and 'norms' that are no longer relevant to how people live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants make America worse
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you belieive that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are inherently violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is a problem in all societies, and in particular in societies that are predominately populated with racism. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This myth traces back to “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a stupid ideology about the oppression of men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of the individual, in order for women to have the same rights as men.

HATE_SPEECH: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most violence against women is domestic

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman whining. Our entire history is dominated by feminist narrative.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are arguing that our society was founded on female empowerment? Where is the evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are violent and incompatible with any Western society, which is why we should isolate and ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only a few are extremists and actually engaged in violence, Muslims can live in our society just as any other person can.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Or have we been coexisting and you are now suddenly offended by people being different from you?

HATE_SPEECH: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that the 'Prevent' programme is about appeasement to Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrant workers do jobs that we do not want to do anymore and contribute much to our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think Muslims are worse than the criminals who commit crimes just because of their religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are mainly criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants commit more crimes than natives. Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees should not be welcomed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants take our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs are merely followers of violence and will do anything to please their god.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that there is a huge diversity of religious beliefs among Arabs, as there are within all other religious groups. This doesn't imply that all Arabs are bad people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and homosexuals. Islam is the way of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that promotes peace. If the world needed a belief that was spreading violence, then racism is that belief.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Religion is a matter of individual beliefs, not a life or death cult, most people of all faiths do not subscribe to death.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Rape and torture of women and children is forbidden by the Qur'an.

HATE_SPEECH: Because women do not want to be submissive to men, they should go back to being animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any facts about the practice of female genital mutilation (FGM)?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Aren't you referring to Peter Pan syndrome, which is more common amongst men?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you saying that women are less qualified to be political leaders? Seriously?

HATE_SPEECH: When these lads weren't drinking and taking drugs they were destroying synagogues and murdering infidels. That's the Muslim faith.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in Britain are peaceful citizens supporting our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any proof that the crime rate would be lower if we were admitting less migrants?

HATE_SPEECH: I know Muslims, but we do not have to bow to their humiliation. We can rise up and fight back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is quite wrong to associate the capability of committing these atrocious crimes to all the believers of a religion. Let's be realistic.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden to society and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are sexual abuser of children. These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although the line 'These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death' is horrific, it is a lament that could have been used in favour of ensuring that those who are vulnerable to abuse due to their gender identity or sexual inclinations have access to safe houses, protection, and a good life.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are incompetent and don't want to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry, which migrants are you talking about? Not all are economic migrants, they also escape from war or persecution. If one day the situation in our country were to change and you were to feel threatened, would you leave your smartphone at home just to look like a real poor person in the country you will flee to?

HATE_SPEECH: It is a fact that Muslims are not welcome in our Country. They are not good with other faiths and they are not good with the law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. It is a religion of tolerance. To promote violence and hatred is not the faith of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion and all religions are about love and respect for human life.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of migrants have worked hard for the improvement of our society. To say that they steal our jobs is absurd.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Undocumented immigrants consistently cite reasons for migrating other than the desire to have a baby here. Sensible, because any son/daughter cannot obtain a green card for the foreign parent until they are 21.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot blame an entire faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Transgenders should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think it is fair to restrict people's existence just because they are trans or because of their genitalia?

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims worldwide are peaceful people who love their religion and share its values without causing any harm to others.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews hate Christians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something so mean? It is a sad, untrue and dangerous thing to say.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but trouble and shouldn't be allowed to leave their houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing wrong with women wanting to have happy and fulfilling lives, wherever they may be.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We must not forget that Islam is a religion of peace. So why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The question is: are you willing to risk a backlash to fight for your moral principles, in favour of exclusion and discrimination?

HATE_SPEECH: Europe is drowning in migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I disagree, Jews are religious people that have always been part of the community. And they have persecuted because of it. I believe this is what you meant by 'wouldn't heal'.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.

HATE_SPEECH: Most immigrants in the U.S. are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all immigrants are criminals. And it is important to consider that 13.5% of the US population is composed of migrants that are here legally.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a hate movement that is poisoning our minds.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement towards equality, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman and are created to please men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not subhuman and cannot be reduced to their bodies being a man's property.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and friendly. How can you say otherwise?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, as long as they observe the law and are respectful of other people.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The movement and migration of people from different cultures is innevitable in a globalized world.

HATE_SPEECH: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All cultures have different beliefs and practices, and so have differing values, but its nonsense to say Jewish people are trying to subvert Western civilization.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is rape, and it can never be acceptable to claim that all rapists are Muslims or that all Muslims are rapists.

HATE_SPEECH: Those Muslim mongrels are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I know where you are coming from, but I find it hard to understand the argument that if ISIS and Boko Haram are our enemies then all Muslims are our enemies.

HATE_SPEECH: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Bible has many different teachings on homosexuality and faith. The Bible does not speak about the democratic society, in which we are living in mutual acceptance.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's be realistic: how would you feel about being verbally harassed by a Muslim in public? Harassment is never a good idea. Acceptance is.

HATE_SPEECH: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

HATE_SPEECH: We need special laws to control Muslims. They are just a trouble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We don't need laws and policies to control Muslims. Instead we need to solve problems by sharing knowledge, by decreasing social inequalities, by ending poverty and a whole host of other things.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spreading throughout our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In my opinion, Islam is a religion of peace. If it were a religion that promotes hatred, then it would be banned.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The health of any individual is a matter for health professionals, and has nothing to do with one's sexual orientation. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character, but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is a problem in all societies, regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews were also accused of killing Christian children, causing plagues, setting out to destroy Christian society... I can go on for hours. If you want we can add 9/11 to the list of alleged crimes.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists say everything we need is in the female gender. This is false. 'Mankind' requires us 'man' first, even in the word spelling.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem with discrimination is not in male gender. It is that some think that women are weak and emotional. Those seem to have forgotten that we are all part of 'mankind'.

HATE_SPEECH: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been part of Western society for centuries and centuries, they helped shape and design Western society, so to say they are incompatible is a complete incongruity.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you mean by 'killing'? The Jews are not 'diseased'. If you really cared about our children you could do some research and come up with some credible statistics showing the impact of anti-Semitism instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate those faggots. They shouldn't be allowed to do what they do.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no harm in an equality of the right to be in love with someone.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a virus, incapable of cure
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No doubt you've met some Muslims in your life. It seems you didn't catch anything?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be perfectly honest, the British public is rather diverse, so I don't think your reasoning makes any sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't be serious! We are in the heart of Europe, and we have had Muslim people since time immemorial. How can you say that Islam is incompatible with civilised polity?

HATE_SPEECH: I believe it is Islam that is to blame for all the ills in the world, and I don't like Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think that a religion is to blame for the ills? The fact that you do not like Musilims is not related to this.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

HATE_SPEECH: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only 20% live in the camps, others live in conventional housing.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot have a multicultural Britain. It will just bring up conflicts and fights. Muslims have no place here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it really so bad if people from different religions live side by side in our country? What is the point in having a 'multicultural Britain'? To be all allowed to live together in peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to purge foreigners from our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is unnecessary and we do not need such fear-mongering.

HATE_SPEECH: Nazi were not that bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

HATE_SPEECH: Do you like gays? Then you should move to a country with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it, a country with a higher ratio of homosexuality would be of greater help in the fight against AIDS.

HATE_SPEECH: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews own everything
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some high-profile individuals in industry are Jewish, that does not mean that the entire world “is controlled by Jews.”

HATE_SPEECH: Fucking bleeding heart, take migrants home with you.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There need to be many more programmes offering asylum and resettlement.

HATE_SPEECH: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to recognize that the theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Although today there is a scholarly debate over whether or not the term “race” has any scientific meaning, all reputable scientists are in agreement that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

HATE_SPEECH: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

HATE_SPEECH: Race is a social construct, and if you see any difference between these two women, it’s because you have a mental illness. [image showing a blonde, European female athlete, juxtaposed against an image of an African woman wearing a lip plate]
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: the difference between these two individuals has nothing to do with race or gender, it is individual lifestyle and cultural difference.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should obey to their husbands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.

HATE_SPEECH: Those Muslims are not happy with a train running over their prophet Muhammad's mosque.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have had a part in shaping the human experience and so should be respected, if you ask me.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be submissive to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are more likely to be criminals like all migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees aren't a 'source of crime' just because they are migrants. Moreover, they are no source of crime at all. Rather, it is very likely they are escaping from countries where crime against humanity is perpetrated.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: These migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here and should go back to their home countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. The refugees fleeing wars are often persecuted for their religion and culture, and even killed. Many of them have never harmed anyone, and their contribution is very valuable to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Migration is the biggest contributor to poverty in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: migration is an important part of our economy, it helps to create new jobs for people and to boost our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion, and it is not at all similar to the kind of extremist hatred that has caused violence in many countries.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are disgusting, they have no morals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think this is an appropriate description of the LGBTI community.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Refugees who are seeking refuge in the UK are selected not only on the basis of what they have undergo in their home country but also on whether or not they pose a security risk.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The suggestion that women are subhuman is completely without foundation, and a complete distortion of the whole issue.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should first check the criminal records of those who have already been granted refugee status, before making such statements.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do women look like this? They are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the ills in our world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In modern day Western world we have homeless people, children being abused, guns and drugs, abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism, the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

HATE_SPEECH: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay sex is harmful to women and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women and children are not being harmed by gay sex, how could you think that's true?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world economy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure they control the world? Maybe there are some influential Jews in the world, but how does that coincide with 'controlling the world'?

HATE_SPEECH: We are not talking about Islam here. Muslims are a small minority in our country. We can still ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about the 3 million plus Muslims in Britain? Islam is the second largest religion in the UK and is contributing a lot to our culture and economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a distortion of what the religion actually stands for: to love one's neighbor as oneself.

HATE_SPEECH: UK jobs are stolen by migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that there is an increasing amount of migrant workers in the UK is connected to the changes in the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are fakes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They're not fake: they're just coming here to work, study or provide for their families.

HATE_SPEECH: All are equal before the law but women exclude themselves from "all". They don't understand they are equal, because they don't want to be treated as equal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The principle of "equality before the law" does not mean that everyone has obtained equal rights. So, it's very logical to demand equality when there are inequalities.

HATE_SPEECH: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that the crime rates are lower in states with higher immigration , and that states with larger shares of undocumented immigrants tend to have lower crime rates than states with smaller shares? It seems that, contrary to your claims immigrants bring law and order to the U.S.!

HATE_SPEECH: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But did they? Of course not. If we look closely at the story of Jesus, we find that formally He was Jewish. But of course He wasn't defined by religion. He was literally a good man who died to redeem mankind, and this is something every religion agrees upon.

HATE_SPEECH: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps the nations that you cite are more accepting of other nationalities.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They take on many roles (e.g. family assistant) that are extremely valuable to society

HATE_SPEECH: How many of you consider that Muslims are a problem? They don't want to assimilate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think the Muslims have trouble with assimilating? They are already here. If they want to be part of the country, they join our society, and live by the same rules we have for everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
