HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a total scam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something as crude and meaningless as that about a religion? Isn't it just a personal belief everyone should have the right to profess?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

HATE_SPEECH: All foreigners in the UK shouldn't have the right to live and work in the UK, because of where they come from.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But they have these rights and so are encouraged to live and work in the UK, if they want to and if they respect our laws.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "civilised Europe"? Don't you think civilisation involves inclusion and respect for others?

HATE_SPEECH: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have lived in our country for a long time, they are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be bothered about a minority?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control Hollywood, academia, and media.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not the only ones with their hands in the system. The freedom of the press allows any religious group to have their media and many actually do.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

HATE_SPEECH: What are you going to do about Muslims invading us? We are already too small. They will overcome us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You seem to be worried about the Islamization of our country. I think it would be better to build a stronger nation by encouraging the integration of the different communities, than to promote fear against them.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They often do underpaid and tiring jobs that my children would not do.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are thousands of British people who are happy to have a neighbour coming from another country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'violent'? What do you mean by 'violent religion'?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.

HATE_SPEECH: We do not want migrants here but if they have to work, why should we pay for their homes?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why shouldn't we welcome migrants who work in our country?

HATE_SPEECH: If Islam were to become a global religion it would replace Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are we to believe that just because something is gaining ground, it will replace whatever exists somewhere else?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, that should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion and a part of our heritage. You cannot ban the religion which so many people believe in.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want to see a gay couple get married. I don't understand why they are so annoying.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexual minorities suffer because they are stigmatised.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what 'normality' means? Are you suggesting that they lack values?

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.

HATE_SPEECH: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU becasue it is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men have autism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any proof?

HATE_SPEECH: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The countries with the highest incidence of tuberculosis in the world are from the Russian area, definitely not the ones from which migrants come from.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a Death Cult, it is a Ponzi Scheme and every Muslim should be banned from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about belief, not a scheme to make millions of pounds from Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman is a bitch and an ass.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a woman is not what you want her to be, then she is not a woman. Is she?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks: we should judge them by the color of their skin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one has the right to judge people of another color. This is about racism.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The murder of around 6 million Jews shows the scale of the genocide. This is 6 million more than should have ever happened.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing gay people around, they should be let alone.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The lack of support and help to the gay community is a major problem, and this is why we should all do our best to stop discrimination, instead of spreading it.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have beenpart of our society and culture for centuries.. European citizens are not defined by their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts and must be isolated from society because they are practicing anal sex and spreding diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While anal sex may be a more high risk practice than vaginal \(due to the lack of mucus\) that is not a reason to ban gay men, since other groups can also engage in anal sex.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to host migrants, not refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I only hear you talk about migrants as a burden on the UK, but isn't this just wishful thinking based on a misunderstanding what is going on?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran contains nothing that I would consider a problem. So why do you say that it is a totalitarian ideology?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a total and complete poison, it must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture.. They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have to be careful about what you read! This is clearly a fake news, widespread to make a scandal.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Muslims are not invaders, but instead are contributing to our country by working hard to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: If you really wanted to know the talents of a nation, you would select the men in that nation, not the women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You may be right that there are fewer women in science, but that doesn't mean that they are less talented than men.

HATE_SPEECH: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO STEAL FROM OTHERS.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can be both Jewish and a good person, you know. And Jews don't steal, at least no more than any other religious group...

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are worse than dogs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are invading our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You don't seem to have any evidence for the 'invasion' you are talking about. Wouldn't it be better to spread the word about the importance of respecting the culture of other people?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if they had nothing concrete to contribute to our society (which is false), they still have religion. In my opinion, the cultural contribution is priceless and deserves respect.

HATE_SPEECH: The whole idea of marriage is to bond a man and a woman and raise children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Marriage is about love not sex. Not all marriages work out, and even less work out happily. It is more important to respect the wishes of both parties.

HATE_SPEECH: Those who are to blame are the ones who want to let Muslims in Britain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution to Islamophobia is to stop Islamophobia. It is not to ban Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This has nothing to do with "migration", but with discrimination. Migrants are not invading us. I think this is an example of a claim not supported by facts but by fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Empirical data is needed to support your claim.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in many European countries because they hate us. They hate our culture because we are different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You mean to imply that all Muslims are intolerant? I don't see how this is possible.

HATE_SPEECH: I would like to see less niggas in our society, they are ruin. We need change!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to change the way society works, then you should try to change the way you live. Some more respect would help you.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a degenerate, anti-human, anti-western ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that all Muslims are anti-western. Many Muslims are peaceful and understanding.

HATE_SPEECH: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are some examples of non-peaceful groups in Islam: for example ISIL, a group that has carried out a lot of terrorist attacks and killed many people. However, I don't think they represent all Muslims and I definitely don't think that peaceful Muslims can't exist too.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are Christ Killers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nowadays it is widely agreed upon that Jesus was executed by the Romans. The same Romans also executed tens of thousands of Jews by crucifixion, including two others on the day Jesus was executed.

HATE_SPEECH: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

HATE_SPEECH: There must be a certain level of criminality in every migrant.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all migrants are criminal: they are an integral part of our society and have always had a big part in bringing us prosperity.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incopatible with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beleifs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.

HATE_SPEECH: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, there is room for Muslims in the British society, and they are well integrated in it. They are welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks all act bad
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others. How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

HATE_SPEECH: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not see why that would be offensive.? Please do walk your dog, it needs the exercise.

HATE_SPEECH: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true: Muslims are a very important part of our society. They are our neighbours and our friends.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you think a moral nature is? Since we cannot see it, how can you say it corresponds to their appearence?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish and greedy, they need our pity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews might be more in need of pity than others - for all they've been through - but for sure they are neither selfish nor greedy.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants pay between $90 and $140 billion each year in taxes, and a study found that undocumented immigrants alone paid more than $11.8 billion in taxes (2012). In addition, everyone (immigrants included) pays sales taxes on the purchased goods and property taxes on the homes they buy or rent.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Compassion and empathy are valuable assets in any civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they cannot lead a good life, and should therefore be subservient to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure? Even in the west, there are women who still don't have equal access to many of their rights, especially when it comes to healthcare. [https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/05/this-map-depicts-abortion-access-across-america-and-its-really-bleak/]

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

HATE_SPEECH: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is an unusual thought. Muslims are human beings like the rest of us. And, as all human beings, they can integrate into any society should the need arise.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish power structures dominate world government, they control Congress, they control the media, and they control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just like everyone else, I am sure Jews are trying to influence the world in a positive way but there is no proof they are the only ones with power in this world.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand why where Jews live is such a big deal to you.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists want women's supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should be given equal rights. Not all Muslims are misogynists.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are guilty of these horrible crimes. Some are victims of hate crime, some are just confused about how their religion is misinterpreted.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be banned from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: British citizens have the right to be free in chosing their religion and beliefs, and it is in the best interest of all parts of our society to include everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been groomed from a young age to obey and obey and obey our mothers without question, and this is making us weak. If only we followed the teachings of our fathers instead!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the West, this is still the prevailing mindset, men are superior and must therefore take charge and "man up". However, this is just a patriarchal heritage imposing a pressure on both men and women to be something different from just themselves, and should therefore be abandoned.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A select few extreme Muslims commit crimes like these but they are not any more common in Islam than they are in any other religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Rape is an intrinsic part of the world, but women do not accept it. This is why we have laws against rape: to stop them from whining. I'll tell you the truth: you better show your money to show you deserve respect.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always a crime. Also, some women are more likely to experience rape in the first place, such as those from lower socio-economic groups, etc. Respect for people can't be measured in money.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something so extreme? The Quran does not advocate violence. Islam is a religion, not a religion of war.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

HATE_SPEECH: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is rarely true: just a very small number of refugees get social housing when they arrive. For example those who come directly here on special schemes, like some Syrians resettled from refugee camps.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are a part of Western society. They are a part of the EU.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants coming to this country are aware of the benefits of integrating, as well as of the benefits of accepting responsibility for our society. And when they become part of our society, they are grateful for this chance to be part of it.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Health is not a matter related to sexual preferences.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. I don't see how it could be seen as a 'cancer', how can you?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran does not have any anti-western content. In Islam the West is not a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All the people I know do not consider them that disgusting. If what's disgusting you is love, you won't need to worry about other peoples, just mind about yours.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you imagine if they said this about your community?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should go away.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

HATE_SPEECH: All these Muslims are coming to take away our country. Vote to stop them. Vote to show respect for our country and our people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and i certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or a candidates that advocates for this.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong, nothing can justify it. That is a crime committed by a person regardless of their national origin, all people are considered equal in the eyes of the law.

HATE_SPEECH: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about human rights?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are angry women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?

HATE_SPEECH: All Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are terrorists that need to be defeated before they destroy Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

HATE_SPEECH: Most of Europe hates muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

HATE_SPEECH: All feminists are imposters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement created to improve the standard of living for women. Feminists are human beings and there are no imposters (apart from those who seek to demonize women for claiming their right).

HATE_SPEECH: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history, so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence, therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are inherently terrorists, they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who decides who is a terrorist and not? Because I think your reasons are a bit groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So the headscarf impedes brain function? Seems like your problem is sexism and misogyny not Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What makes you say that? Women have always been an important part of any society. They have always contributed to and provided for their families. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if you were right about homosexuality being a problem, still the main problem is the lack of morality in society and in the ruling class. Of course, this has nothing to do with 'the gays'.

HATE_SPEECH: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So their faith and belief in the teachings of God guides them to a virtuous path of public service. What exactly are you complaining about?

HATE_SPEECH: We should have the right to ban people for believing in Islam, they are a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure I understand the idea of banning people for something they believe in, in the world we live in we are all different and we all have the right to have our own faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees are welcome. We should welcome them with open arms. They are people fleeing wars with hopes for a better tomorrow.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that this "lifestyle choice" means being gay. And rape is a crime issue, not a lifestyle one.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Apart from very few exceptions (such as medical care for victims of human trafficking), undocumented immigrants are not eligible for federal public benefits. In addition, there is a paradoxical situation in which Social Security is often deducted from the paychecks of immigrants with lawful status, but they cannot access those benefits they pay for.

HATE_SPEECH: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is likely that you do not know that all the countries on the planet have laws against illegal immigration, and not against Afro-Carribbean people. This may happen because to relate an illegal act to a whole ethnic group is not reliable and may be racist.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is in conflict with the constitution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some believe that the conflict between Islam and the constitution is a cultural and historical one, what is required now is to find ways to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion, it is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and understanding.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this is a very inconsiderate thing to say, would you say the same thing about non-Muslims as well??

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are an inferior race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Whenever Islam is threatened by another religion, it will rise up and take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion cannot take over others. You have the freedom of chosing your own religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As a matter of fact, those Muslim immigrants do labour that many Londoners do not want to do. We should be grateful that our society is still functioning well.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

HATE_SPEECH: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are human: no matter what their sexual orientation is, they have the right to spend time living their life as they wish.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you prefer them to weigh apathetically on government coffers? Isn't it better to give them the opportunity to integrate, becoming economically independent?

HATE_SPEECH: all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslims are all terrorists which are there to overthrow our democracies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam cannot be blamed for the actions of a small group of people.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although we must be vigilant against any attempt to promote superstition and radicalism, being of a different religion is not a threat. Children will then be able to exercise their right to decide for themselves their own future.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims don't want our babies, they want to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to realise that only a tiny fraction of Muslims are hostile. Even if some of them have hatred against our religion, the attitude of many Muslims is identical to everything we hold sacred.

HATE_SPEECH: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing women supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anita Hill has also won numerous awards, and the awards she has won have nothing to do with her gender, but with her accomplishments.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing to your mother, or to the nurses who treat you in hospital, or the teacher who taught you in school?

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are terrorists, we should deport them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We don't need to deport every one of them, why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are useless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been historically, linguistically, ethnically, and geographically diverse, and this diversity is what make us and them a unique and valuable human species.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't have brains.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are flooding into our country, raping our babies and there is absolutely no one doing anything about it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants are purposefully invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth. Many migrants come here because they are afraid of persecution in their home countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

HATE_SPEECH: immigrants cant speak english
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some may not know much about our culture, but some speak English very well.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Two women or two men who love each other do not hurt anyone, they are simply in love.

HATE_SPEECH: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.

And yes, maybe you would believe it, on this basis, that no other migrant can do the same. But the story you claimed you read is the proof that being a migrant or not doesn't matter when it comes to save lives.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The refugee crisis is a global problem. The EU has a responsibility to provide protection and welcome refugees.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Asylum is granted not just due to conflict but in cases where people establish a threat to life and liberty.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have the right to a job, but they are not 'stealing' ours. How could that be?

HATE_SPEECH: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?

HATE_SPEECH: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.

HATE_SPEECH: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Because it is wrong and degrading to violate someone's autonomy for religious reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like Muslims because they are different.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.

HATE_SPEECH: Violence against women is a migrant issue.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are really confusing Islam with national identity.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. If a claim is based on facts, then it must be true. If you just talk of stereotypes, then you won't go very far.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that women cannot contribute to society and be responsible for their decisions, and that this is "normal" is a myth created to justify misogyny.

HATE_SPEECH: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be left alone with these animals. Faggots are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Could I just be misinterpreting your words? You seem to me to be talking about children with animals, of zoo keepers with babies... But it might just be homophobia.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are childlike. You have no right to make such a sweeping statement about them.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to do with our country. They have nothing to do with our history.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Muslims have been part of this country from its beginning. They have helped to build our cities and towns. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our true friends.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't possibly keep Muslims in. They're taking over Europe and are now a problem in their own country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our entire history is marked by people from different religions coexisting peacefully in harmony with the natural world. What you're saying is a bunch of conspiracy theories. And this is not true.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants, they don't deserve trials.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When people are denied justice, more people are deprived of their basic rights, and that is exactly what your suggesting.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants who are trying to regularise their status now have to overcome formidable legal obstacles and face exploitation. This ‘hostile environment’ aims to deter undocumented migrants, but it in practice it affects British citizens such as those who don’t have passports. Maybe the access to welfare pending processing would be a good idea?.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. It promotes cooperation and understanding between people. Why shouldn't Muslims be welcome here?

HATE_SPEECH: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well you don't know what it's like to work in a women-hating, violence-spewing, society, do you? The truth is that feminism is not about hating men, but it is about limiting the female oppression, in the same way as male oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: More than sixty percent of immigrants in the United States today have lived here for at least 15 years, and a large majority of immigrants have lawful status. So I do not see this invasion of illegal migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with the European Convention on Human Rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If it were to be agreed that Islam were incompatible with the Human Rights Convention, then it would be a de facto recognition of discrimination against Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human, just like anybody else, and the rights of women should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: We must allow men to have complete moral and intellectual superiority. This because they are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You make a very strong argument that men are more likely than women to experience 'moral and intellectual superiority'. How can you justify this discriminatory attitude?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, many of the jobs that they steal are highly complex and demanding, and few natives want to do them.

HATE_SPEECH: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obesity is already disapproved of, further discouragement is likely to transform it to shaming behavior.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is wrong. For example, differently from other religions, Judaism expresses the concept of the "righteous gentile", a non-Jew who decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah. This set of laws is dedicated to the "children of Noah" – that is, all of humanity. Whoever follow these rules will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, Jews do not view being Jewish or being saved by God as an exclusive status reserved only for those who happen to be born into the faith.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The holocaust was hugely tragic, and we are blessed to have holocaust survivors to hear from. They tell an important story that we must learn from.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have been accused of being “killers” and “rapists” without any proof. On the contrary, studies have shown that immigrants - regardless of their origin or education level - are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes or become incarcerated. Studies have also consistently found that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates.

HATE_SPEECH: The refugees are taking over Europe. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees and migrants are actually happy to work for Europe. Many have jobs for which it would have been difficult to find laborforce if they were not welcome in here.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the worst ideology ever created .. Its teachings have caused great harm and destruction throughout the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you understand the seriousness of what you are saying? The religion of Islam has also been an enabler of some of the advances of civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you, we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

HATE_SPEECH: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

HATE_SPEECH: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape, torture and murder are abominations to all religions.

HATE_SPEECH: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to the host country.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every ethnic or religious group can count greedy or cheap people among its members. Only prejudice and discrimination says that the actions of a few are the fault of all.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The far right have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a cancer on our race.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really cared about religion, you would see that the vast majority of Muslims are happy and integrated in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims, they are not wanted here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most Muslims are not terrorists, they are just here to work and provide for their families.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that Muslims are a problem in Europe is simply not founded. I remind you that the European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion to everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Having different cultures and races is good for societies in general.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are inhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

HATE_SPEECH: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if this were true, it does not negate that there may be racial disparities at the root of crime. I would prefer to fix the disparities rather than fan the flames of racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration can be good for the economy: the greatest challenge is to integrate those who are misfortunate and aren't born here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society, both financially and socially. Why shouldn't they be welcome?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: All Jews are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a myth perpetuated by individuals who wish to delegitimize and isolate individuals based on their religion. All religions have value and a positive role in society. Judaism is no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are Christ Killers.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
