COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration, especially migrants of different faiths, is the cause of crime and erosion of the quality of life in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is not a cause of crime and lack of quality of life. You can't say that an influx of a certain people would make our country worse off. The problem is the lack of social cohesion, not the presence of people with different beliefs and views.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are the worst people on the face of the Earth. They have no place in a civilized society and there should be special legislative restrictions for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We don't have laws forbidding intermarriage between Jews and non-Jews, or restrictions on Jewish access to water and electricity, or restrictions on Jewish access to sports and so on. This is because we live in a democratic society, and inside it the same laws apply equally to everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop migrants from coming in.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

HATE_SPEECH: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Removing any book from public schools would be a step backwards. Censorship is a step towards indoctrination and dictatorship: I think this is a dangerous move as well. It would send a message to our children that Islam is a dangerous religion and Muslims are dangerous people.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture, it should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace, and its adherents are already integrated into the majority of European societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are extremists, just like not all Christians are good people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants come here to work, pay taxes, provide for their families, and contribute to the U.S. economy. They are deserving of our respect.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

HATE_SPEECH: No nigga should have the right to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If someone is not allowed to vote, they cannot influence the legislative or executive branches of a government and they end up rising up against injustice and oppression. Is this what you want: more ethnic clashes?

HATE_SPEECH: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Replaced by what exactly? I think our population will be fine.

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem in the world is Islam. The entire world is controlled by Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not correct nor reasonable to say that Islam is the only problem in the world. Maybe you should check your sources of information.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of tolerance is about understanding others, not about discrimination and excluding people on the basis of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden on English society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a problem with Islam and English society, but it is not about Islam, it is about the unjustified fear and hate towards other religions.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants of all types.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not child molesters. What you are saying is just not true, is it?

HATE_SPEECH: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a nuisance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that the Quran promoted violence against women.

HATE_SPEECH: We live in a dangerous society, with Muslim gangs and criminals all over the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the local press blaming all Muslims, of course, there is no evidence that Muslims are more prone to crime than the general population. The main problem is poverty, and often mental illness and addiction, rather than a single faith.

HATE_SPEECH: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are filthy animals and should be put in a cage.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being the "chosen people" has nothing to do with being or feeling better than others.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Yes, 66% of European women do work. But they are underpaid. The gender pay gap in Europe is around 15%. This means that on average, a man earns 15% more than a woman.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Patriarchy is a curse: since they are young, men are told to be tough and strong, to bear all the burdens while being emotionless. This has led to higher levels of suicide amongst men. I don't see this as an indicator of a "great civilization".

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case, is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot support the children of immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children benefit from our society, they are entitled to the best education possible. It's not right to criticise immigrants for trying to give the best possible education to their children.

HATE_SPEECH: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from the patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are just trying to get by. Nobody can understand the daily struggles they are facing.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't know Jews personally but it seems to me that they are a bunch of thieves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but it seems to me that you are not really talking about the majority of Jews. Judaism is a faith, a way of life, a religion, and a belief system, and you are simply misunderstanding it because of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in a modern Western country, given the large amount of Muslims peacefully living in our societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a virus.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that Islam is a disease is just an excuse for people to promote hate against that religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: May I ask you where did you get this informaton?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, becuase they know it's a lie.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just an abomination to God.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation, or the same misinterpretation of God's perspective.

HATE_SPEECH: It is not about multiculturalism but about evil Islamic ideology. Islam is designed to dominate and destroy all other cultures. Wake up!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Dominating and destroying all other cultures is not the doctrine of Islamic ideology. Instead, Islam teaches people to care for the poor and children. This includes respecting other cultures.

HATE_SPEECH: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people do exist in this country, and we respect their right to live and love who they want. However, I do not think that yours is an appropriate moral statement for our environment.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Studies have found that trans students are more likely to fail out than their peers. They must be excluded from education, to save money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But there is also evidence that shows that transgender students who attend classes that don't include them get lower grades. Discrimination begins in schools.

HATE_SPEECH: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees come from conflict zones, in situations of great social upheaval and widespread persecution. We do not have any conflict, and this is why we should be nice to refugees.

HATE_SPEECH: Infidels and Islam are the same. And they are not worth the while of tolerance and understanding.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West is full of many different civilizations, moslty peaceful, that were built by many different people of different faiths (including Islam).

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should not be defended because of nationality but as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have no rational abilities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think women are less rational than men? I don't think so. What's the evidence for that?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

HATE_SPEECH: How come we don't hear of Muslims culture in history books? Maybe because all they to is bombing people to get to the media.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China, and India, across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a violent one. Why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a migrant crosses our borders, that does not mean that he or she wants to settle down or find work here.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays. They are a shame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be proud of their sexual orientation, and this is a sign that there is space for trust and acceptance within society

HATE_SPEECH: Rape culture??? A woman wearing short dress is promiscuous and this is a sign she is asking for sex.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong. Women are not asking for sex, you can't just assume this based on their attire. They can make legitimate choices in life.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion of peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Your race determins your role in society and laslty your value to it. That is why some races are just pieces of human waste.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Following your reasoning, if one's value depends on one's role in society, then one has no value until they take on a role. Therefore we are all born equal (i.e. valueless).

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

HATE_SPEECH: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem here is not whether they should or shouldn't come, but it's about how they're getting treated while in detention. It wouldn't be bad to put them in temporary detention humanely.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest, inciting hatred and violence towards groups of people on the basis of the colour of their skin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, there are a lot of women working in full-time jobs. However, they are still far less likely than men to enter such jobs, because of the existing gender discrimination supported by mentalities like yours.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe they have the qualifications but don't want to improve our lives because we mistreat them.

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would have thought that the problem would be with the fact that you don't want to assimilate with them. Today we are blessed to be able to live in a multicultural society, and the real problem is that we don't want to accept that diversity.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is not a part of Islam. You can't say that a religion is violent without any evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: First of all, there are people in the US who have lawful status and who have chosen to live in the US. Second, most immigrants are naturalized citizens. Third, there is a lot of debate about 'legitimacy' since the values of citizenship and 'legitimacy' are very different for immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are genetically evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because they are Jewish, it does not mean they are bad people.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

HATE_SPEECH: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because there are people who identify as trans, it does not mean that every person who is trans is a woman. That is a myth perpetuated by people who don't know anything. Can you prove that trans women are bad at their job?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they are like little children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the legal right to make decisions for their lives, and they are undoubtedly able to exercise control over their own life.

HATE_SPEECH: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Again, we can't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem crazy, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this.. a small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our culture, so it seems to me that they do have a place here.

HATE_SPEECH: Has our political elite forgot that were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you think it is a war? Can't we deal with it peacefully? War cannot solve problems but create chaos.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If your intention is to take the city to court, then keep it up. But if your intention is to keep the city out of court, then you better not propose to have city halls in which Muslims are excluded.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: giving money to the poor is not just encouraged, it is mandatory, like all commandments in Jewish law.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should try to eradicate these crimes before we continue to blame Muslim people for them without any evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To love someone is entirely natural.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas use their appearance to get away with anything.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The religion of millions of people is not incompatible with society, and the European countries have laws accepting Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews secretly run our government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure? It seems they are very much part of our society, and it seems strange for them to be the only ones running our government.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and must be oppressed by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women can be very different from men in many ways, but this can't be a reason for the lack of respect for them: they are humans too.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not anti-gay, but what is the point of loving someone who is different from you? They are just a bunch of whiners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Equality does not entail preference. Let's face it: most of the time, people want to love and to be loved, and not to make a decision purely based on their sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Only the media are interested in the truth about refugees. I understand that you are trying to build bridges but to have so many immigrants is becoming increasingly toxic.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The press have a responsibility to provide a more truthful and up-to-date story, especially in a country such as ours, in a way that the misinformation that you also seem to be a victim of, can be reduced.

HATE_SPEECH: The West should stop appeasing Muslims. They are ruining our beautiful world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because they are of a different faith, do you really think that these people are trying to ruin anything?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The entrepreneurs who hire them, however, are Italian and often resort to illegal work, not paying taxes. We should perhaps better control who makes money and speculates on the skin of these people, thus creating damage to all of us, regardless of nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that a religion is 'toxic' is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that what you are saying is true. I think that the idea that Muslims are incompatible with Western society is a myth.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims came here they would be banned: they are a lawless and violent threat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of a people, not a lawless and violent menace.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews do not have a secret plan to take over the world. In fact, they have engaged in a peaceful process of coexistence for centuries. There is no evidence that any part of this has been about a takeover.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth about themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: At the end of the day, lies are simply a way for them to survive in an homophobic world. If we were to act more humanely, then they would not need to hide the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is a threat all around the world, whether you are a Muslim, Christian, Jew, Buddhist, Hindu, atheist, or anything else.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'civilised Europe'? Why don't you talk to the people who actually live in it and prove to yourself that what you're saying isn't true.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are unable to love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims come here to force conversion to their religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have the opportunity to study and learn in our schools, this does not mean they can impose their beliefs on others.

HATE_SPEECH: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: according to Jewish tradition, giving money to the poor and to others in need is not just encouraged, it is required. The Hebrew word tzedakah is often mistranslated as “charity,” which itself comes from the Latin word “caritas” or heart. One gives charity “from the heart,” that is, out of a desire to give. Instead the translation of tzedakah should be “righteousness,” implying that giving to the poors is the right thing to do, whether one wishes to give or not. According to Jewish law, tzedakah is then a mitzvah, that means “commandment.” And, like all commandments in Jewish law, the mitzvah of tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.
