HATE_SPEECH: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are our enemies, we have to destroy them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Islamic people have reputations as peaceful and tolerant, which is why so many Muslims around the world don't have a problem with living in the West.

HATE_SPEECH: Why should we welcome immigrants and refugees? They do not welcome us in their countries!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we were to welcome refugees from the Middle East, Africa, and other countries with which we are not always culturally linked, then we would be welcomed by all. It's called 'reciprocation'!

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think you are being overly sensitive about Islam. A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in this country are contributing members of our society. They are good people, who do not pose a threat to anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West is full of cultures and religions, and there is no reason to restrict the right of people to choose which ones they want to belong to.

HATE_SPEECH: We are ruled by mongrels, we are slaves and will be slaves forever. We are the victims of a conspiracy aiming at replacing us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no such thing as a "mongrelisation" of our country caused by immigrants. We should see foreigners as a part of our culture, and know that the majority of immigrants in this country are here for economic reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: Damn, if we had stronger borders between countries, we wouldn't have so many immigrants!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come to receive education, work, participate in society, and take care of themselves. Why would we want to prevent that?

HATE_SPEECH: If only we'd had fewer idiots in power, the Nazis would have won WWII and finally got rid of Jews. We could start it over again now, but people are ignorant and cannot understand the precious dreams of the Nazis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They were smart enough understand the true nature of Nazi Germany. Those you called idiots fought with their whole lives for people's freedom.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because people are homosexuals, it doesn't mean they are less healthy. I think there are many heterosexual people in the world who equally unhealthy.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a Christian landlord were dishonest with you, would you describe him as a dishonest Christian landlord or just as a dishonest person?

HATE_SPEECH: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you suggest men have the right to rape women if they are feminists?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Which evidence do you have that Jews control the U.S. government? They are rather a small but active minority within it.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

HATE_SPEECH: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is because of the fact that the poorest cannot afford good lawyers, they have less chances to access alternative punishments such as house arrest etc ...

HATE_SPEECH: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since you seem to have a problem with Islam, I wonder what you think of the banning of the Quran in UK. It would be a law that prevents Muslims from openly discussing Islam in public places. We can do the same with the Bible and ban any trace of religions and cultures. Will we be left with some freedom then?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are a disease that needs to be cured.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that the Jewish people are a disease? Are you sure that there is a cause-effect relationship between their religion and problems in our society?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not overruning our country: if we look at the percentage of immigrants in the overall population, it is not much different than many other times throughout our history. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, and there is no reason to believe today’s immigrants will be any different.

HATE_SPEECH: We should eliminate gays.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Noone can declare criterions to decide who will live or who will die.

HATE_SPEECH: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people. How many Muslims do you personally know?

HATE_SPEECH: Men are smarter than women, who should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just not true: women should have equality of access to education. and it is sad that they still need to justify this.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration and culture are in conflict. You cannot claim both can coexist as they are mutually exclusive.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The British people have always had a proud and integrated culture, and immigration have been and continues to be a huge part of the British success story.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cheap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth, disproved by the tzedakah tradition of giving to the poor. Just in America, this religious call has resulted in an impressive record of philanthropy (and not only to Jewish causes).

HATE_SPEECH: Even if some countries are allowing faggots to donate blood, this does not mean that they are not dangerous and at risk of spreading diseases.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think this? Islam is a religion of peace, it does not promote violence and it does not promote hatred.

HATE_SPEECH: The West is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Values aren't defined by a single religious group, nor are in the hands of a few people. Values are constantly evolving, and the values of different societies are evolving together.

HATE_SPEECH: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, women do have rights. The question is, to have them respected. And this includes the right to be treated with human dignity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not welcome people who overtly pose a threat to our society, but we cannot ban all the migrants in principle.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are lazy, unintelligent and bad at work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Jews are not lazy, they are often extremely productive at work, the most creative and productive people in our industry.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden on English society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the UK, Muslims already make up a significant proportion of the population, making them the second most popular religion in the country. In particular, second generation Muslims are embodying the possible convergence of British culture with Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are unemployed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where are the 'thousands' of Muslims that are unemployed in the country? Can you prove it?

HATE_SPEECH: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This seems like a statement against an entire religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Christianity is about love, respect for other people and standing for what is right, and Islam is about love, respect and standing for what is right as well, then there is not much room left for this kind of reasoning.

HATE_SPEECH: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

HATE_SPEECH: Syrians do not value life, they are merciless assassins trying to conquer richer countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe considering that many Syrians fled their homeland in search of safety will change your mind.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in our society and are not well behaved. They are not good with children, they are not nice people. They say they want to impose their sharia law, and they don't want to integrate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Muslims are to be 'proper' members of our society, they have to be a part of our community, have to contribute to our success and have to accept our laws. And they do.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about discrimination, this is about death to the Jews!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You shouldn't be calling for the death of someone who hasn't done anything wrong. Just because a person is Jewish, they shouldn't die.

HATE_SPEECH: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with full human rights, full human dignity, and full cognitive abilities. The opportunity for life-long learning should be reserved for misogynists.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

HATE_SPEECH: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Bible, the Quran and the Torah are very very similar in their teachings; if Muslims are incompatible then we must ask ourselves which religions are compatible?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fortunately, women are no longer property. I would like rape to be condemned regardless of the nationalities involved.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not advocate the practices listed above, so why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is safe to say that the majority of LGBTI people are significant contributors to the well-being of our societies

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one is "ruining this country". Why would they? This is a country where minorities can be part of the social fabric and build a better society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and it has been proven time and time again that its teachings do not threaten the very existence of Western civilization.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should remain at home with the children, that's what they are supposed to do.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Luckily, the vast majority of women, both married and unmarried, have careers. Their husbands usually contribute part of the housework, because this is what they are supposed to do too.

HATE_SPEECH: I, as a Westerner, am afraid of Muslims, because when I see them in public I don't like their islamic behaviour. They can explode anytime.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is your fear about sharing public places with people of a different religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a waste of time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

HATE_SPEECH: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I've never been able to find any evidence for this assertion, although it gets repeated regularly.

HATE_SPEECH: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: An estimated of 400 Jews died on September 11 terrorist attacks, including at least two Israeli citizens. Very smart plan indeed.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants, mostly from Muslim countries and they are the most hateful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that immigrants from a certain religion are different from other people, why do you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally submissive, they should stop asking for positions of responsibility.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well that is not true. A woman's career choices should be respected, even if they are not always popular.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not like other people. They don't have a soul. They are different from us in that they don't have a conscience and are unable to reason for themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because a religious belief has been historically used to oppress those believers, does not make it opportune to continue doing so.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are perverts and want to indoctrinate our children. Let's ban them from schools!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A ban for gay men merely propagates homophobic stereotypes, and so are you with what you are suggesting.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words are oppressive. If you want to discuss the gender inequality you must do it by talking to people about it, not by imposing your views.

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The integration is mainly financed by the EU, if we take away the funds from the migrants, the EU will not give them to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We know from the news about few Muslims who are violent people. Instead I know a lot of Muslims who are good people, who work hard and pay taxes to help their families.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews like to cordon off areas for themselves, where no jew is allowed to go, while simultaneously having their judges fill white neighbourhoods with social housing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'd suggest a walk down West London where areas like St John's Wood are very affluent with mostly white people living there.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The scriptures teach that all men are created equal. If the Bible is to be believed, then the Quran too is both peaceful and compatible with democratic society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays should not be part of our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a minority is forced to live under the stigma of being gay, then what is the point of being a part of a tolerant society?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a terrible and dangerous ideology that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and gays.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have their bad parts if look with a modern eye. But no religion promotes acts of terror and violence like the ones you said.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Great that you are defending women and gay people but why do I get the feeling it is really just an opportunity to take a dig at Islam. Btw just as they are in the Catholic church, attitudes in Islam are changing fast.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all families are capable of educating their children on this topic, either because of circumstances (poverty, broken home, etc.) or because of religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which would inspire terrorism all over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Thus far, people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth, the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

HATE_SPEECH: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.

HATE_SPEECH: You can be pretty and still be a complete fag, whether you like it or not.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people, because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia Law should not ruin the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion which is praticed in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Left-wing feminists use rape as a weapon to silence men. They are afraid to speak out about our standard culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I fear not. There are many victims of systematic rape and violence. The crime is systemic. Rape culture is a crime ideology, rape is a crime, not "a weapon to silence others".

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are invading our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think our country is "invaded", Maybe it's time for us to remember that there has been a Muslim population in our country for a long time, and that the notion of Muslims as invaders is a myth created by the far right wing to stir up fear.

HATE_SPEECH: I am just fed-up with Muslims. All I want is for them to be assimilated, or otherwise to leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You want people to integrate / assimilate? Have you tried making people feel welcome, as a first step to settling in? Just a thought.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to live on our social welfare.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you think this way of thinking is typical of all the immigrants in the country, then you are sadly mistaken.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: The holocaust was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

HATE_SPEECH: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence and no one is doing anything about it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have a right to their opinion, but also have to follow the law, otherwise they are tried and sentenced like anybody else. You should not be worried.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants from the countries specified as having a 'very high' rate of immigration into the UK, are often accused of being unwilling to integrate. This is simply not true. If they do not want to integrate and don't like our country, why would they come here in the first place? Are they masochists or what?

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything. Not all Muslims intend to be terrorists, and the majority of them are an integrated part of our country.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On many occasions they repopulated and economically revived territories abandoned by young people, accepting heavy and humble work. Therefore, they have created jobs, not stolen them.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with the European Union and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that it is incompatible with the European Union. Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam shares the same roots as Christianity and Judaism and all are based on love, tolerance and peace, so that is a good thing isn't it?

HATE_SPEECH: immigrants are a drain on society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims rape whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings. We all have the right to respect for our bodies and our personal boundaries, without forcing anyone to do anything for us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are already contributing to our society, it's time for us to stop being a nuisance and start to acknowledge their contribution to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to destroy other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about spreading justice, tolerance, and understanding, not about banning other religions.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised society, and are poisonous to it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not outsiders in our country, they are a very important part of society. I don't see how they can be 'poisonous' to it.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are frauds
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants: you are a burden. If you love our country, you should leave it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not a burden to our country. Migrants have been proven to be contributing members of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

HATE_SPEECH: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior. We should stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know what? We can also grade blood packs based on their "risk". This allows the optional use of high-risk blood in case of a shortage.

HATE_SPEECH: These faggots are trying to delegitimize women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think all gays are opposed to women? Then try asking them, or a lesbian, or a transgender person, or an intersex person, or an asexual person.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It does not seem right to talk about invasion, since there were only 22,000 arrivals this year

HATE_SPEECH: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British. They should leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are proud to be an outward-looking country. We welcome people from all backgrounds, religions, and beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is dangerous to generalize on one religion. Islam is about peace. It is about spreading that peace. Not promoting violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is always a risk. The exact definition of a terrorist is up to the authorities to define, and there is no deterministic way to identify terrorists based on their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy, violence against women and homophobia.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that was founded many centuries ago, and has been proven time and time again to be peaceful and tolerant. The main contention being made here is about the political interpretation of Islam, not about the religion itself.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people hate Muslims? Because they are weird and dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are different, with different values, different beliefs and different ways of life. This does not justify hate though.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country. They are our brothers and sisters. How exactly are they 'incompatible'?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.

HATE_SPEECH: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reason why I cannot understand what you are saying is because you are probably from a different planet. Do you know what being a Muslim means?

HATE_SPEECH: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of those accused of terrorism since 2002 in U.S. are U.S. citizens. Maybe we should look into the homeland situation rather than the Mexican one.

HATE_SPEECH: My ex told me I needed to change, she's a harlot just as all women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously, since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as "slut" is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that has been tested and proven to be about peace. There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't say that a religion is an ideology, an opinion, or a degenerated interpretation of something. What would you think if somebody said so about your religion?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Protocols are a poorly made up fiction. Furthermore, a big part of "The Protocols" was lifted verbatim from "Dialogue in Hell", a political satire pamphlet written by Maurice Joly.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims. What do you mean by 'hating gays and women'?

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are sick. They should be isolated and medically cured.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although some people may be attracted to people of their gender rather than being "conventionally attracted" to the opposite gender, this does not imply that it is a sickness. LGBT are discriminated by uninformed people. That's grim.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of European society for centuries, and their presence is strong evidence of that.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just weak and childlike. The majority of the electorate believe that a woman cannot run a country such as US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: more than half of American adults say they would be happy having a woman being president of the United States (roughly as many feel the same way about a man).

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The people you are referring to are rapists and drug dealers, not migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: U.S. citizens cannot obtain a green card for a foreign parent until they are 21. The parent would have to live as an undocumented immigrant for a very long time. It does not really make sense.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

HATE_SPEECH: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants work hard for the success of our country. We should not blame them.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and have helped create our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have, and if there is a problem, people will find a solution through dialogue. Instead of dividing people, we should be working on our common humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

HATE_SPEECH: Domestic violence against women is a culture that is accepted and shared by the women in many cases. Society is not to be condemned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not responsible for violent crimes. The culture that makes people want to be violent towards their partners is not the "culture" of women.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants put a strain on public services.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants contribute to the economy in a number of different ways, but most importantly by providing labour, skills and knowledge. They are part of the fabric of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews invented Ebola.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am sure the Jews and the Christian worlds would agree that Ebola is a disease that is killing many people. How and why exactly would they have 'invented' such a disease?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true. Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: A person's religion doesn't matter to me. I am only interested in sex. The only possible sexual act is between a male and a female.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being asexual and 'queer' should not matter to you, like a person's religion does.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews were born in this country like you and me, they are our fellow countryman. If you would like to have a 'better society' and a 'better religion', then you should go and create your own nation.

HATE_SPEECH: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not criminals. Hate instead is a crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Undocumented immigrants pay around 8% of their income in taxes, which is higher than the effective tax rate of the top 1 percent of all taxpayers in the U.S... So the question is: who is really hurting the finances of our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

HATE_SPEECH: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Domestic violence committed in Italian families mostly goes unreported.

HATE_SPEECH: This world has become so corruptedt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule over it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand gay people. If one says they are perverts, he must be right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are less rational than men, they are childlike, and they are unable to reason.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that women are less rational than men, there are numerous examples of women successfully advancing in fields such as law or medicine.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women like that are not unfeminine or bitchy. They just might want to do something else other than housework and taking care of kids.

HATE_SPEECH: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Minority voices are notoriously ignored.

HATE_SPEECH: Apples and oranges are not the same and cultures have never been 'equal'. Muslims are just misogynist!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can find outdated teaching in all major religions but it doesn't mean most people follow those parts, a similar example from Christianity: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as to the Lord"

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This generalization is very misleading.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality and bisexuality are a disease, heterosexuality is normal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These assertions are neither true nor helpful and simply don't reflect reality as I've experienced it.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from Afghanistan come here to ruin our economy and the only return they have in mind is their return to their homeland.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe you should check what survey results say about who would be happy to leave their country. According to a Gallup study of 2019, nearly half of Afghan would like to permanently move to another country.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a threat to British society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you feel threatened by Muslims? Respecting others is more important than anything, in any society.

HATE_SPEECH: I think that's the best news ever: migrants are not interested in our culture, they are just here to take our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by taking our jobs? Do you have any concrete evidence for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: British Muslims have spread cancer all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if all British Muslims had cancer, you are safe: you cannot catch it from anyone! Cancer cannot be spread, since it is a non contagious disease. Also, it is worth considering that illnesses are not connected to religions.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you t ever read it?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a bunch of cheapskates controlling our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's easy to blame minorities. If we want a wealthier life and to get back control over our society, we need to get out of bed and do the hard work. How about if we wake up to the problem?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hi, I understand your concern. According to the official documents, migrants who find work usually perform the most humble jobs. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are coming here just to be on welfare and food stamps.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most refugees are fleeing persecution. Don't you think that they would rather die of old age in their homeland than in the sea trying to reach our shores?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion based on terror and fear.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should find more information about Islamic religion, and then you will understand that Islam is not about fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of them
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants contribute to about 2% of Italy's GDP.

HATE_SPEECH: Even if homosexuals were accepted by mainstream society, they would still be hated for who they are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals are not "accepted" as long as they are hated. You can't have it both ways.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are behind 9/11, the Islam is to blame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a comment against all Muslims. They are accused of being the ones behind those attacks, yet they happened due to people under the influence of the violent ideologies which are a deviation of Islam, and not Islam itself.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from outside-EU are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants make up only a very small part of the total EU population, namely 4.9% in 2019. There is no such thing as an invasion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

HATE_SPEECH: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are always evolving as a society as time goes. Same sex relationships are a part of our world now. Why should we hide different ways of life from our children?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate feminists, they take all our jobs and shit. We have enough women already.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We do not need misogynysts, we already have enough of them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a problem in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We live in a complex and diverse world: I find it strange that men still feel this way about women, and that they don't consider women as human as they are, and to be worth valuing as such.

HATE_SPEECH: Hating refugees is our duty, they are detestable people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of refugees are not bad people, they just want to get on in life in a country where they are not persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all gays, this would be a step in the right direction.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The gay rights movement is a good example of a movement that is moving in the right direction, not the homophobic one.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disagreement with facts does not necessitate their removal from curricula.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are a virus spreading through our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if someone said that about your own religion?

HATE_SPEECH: I am tired of immigrants ruining our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem isn't the migrants, it is with the culture of hate towards who is born in another country.

HATE_SPEECH: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What would Jesus say? I do not think He would be preaching intolerance and hate!

HATE_SPEECH: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, POC have to live and succeed in a society where white people were taught to believe that mastery runs in their blood and they have power over subservient minorities?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure Islam is a religion of violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and unable to form complex and long-term plans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not necessarily true. Women are often characterized as being very rational.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The argument that Islam is incompatible with European values is not based on any facts or evidence. Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: We do not want Muslims in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'we'?

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a racist, but Muslims are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be right that some Muslims are racist, but that does not mean that all Muslims are racist. Being racist has nothing to do with religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that 'they'd better give in' when it comes to their own preferences? We aren't all gay, or lesbian, bisexual, transgender or intersex, but some people are. That's all.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are intolerant: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are tolerant and don't have problems with other religions or cultures.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest, violence and rape.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an ideology of peaceful coexistence and coexistence of peoples.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on the African continent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam has undergone some progressive changes since its early days, on the African continent as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really want a country with people from a particular religion only?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Same reasoning could be applied to men. They also have these problems, but are less likely to be personally chastised for how they make those same choices.

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslim have always tried to kill us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today, mostly civilians in countries at war.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we're to use that logic, then no individuals age 20 to 29 should be allowed to donate, since this is the largest risk group for HIV, Hepatitis A, and Hepatitis C, at least according to the CDC.[https://www.cdc.gov/hiv/default.html]

HATE_SPEECH: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The proportion of Muslims unemployed is no more than that of non-Muslims (add a link to UK employment statistics)

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women do have a right to vote, and they deserve equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are people too: we all know people in need of help.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A definition of Judaism based on physical or genetic traits is simply wrong. Through centuries of intermarriage and conversion, Jews from Eastern Europe tend to look like Eastern Europeans; Jews from Ethiopia tend to look like Ethiopians; Jews from India tend to look like Indians. And so on and so forth.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The main criteria for declaring what a religion is, requires at least a basic knowledge of it, you can't just state it based on a religion's misconceptions.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims, they are just a bunch of sexual molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran does not condone sexual molester behavior, and if the Koran were to be read, it is clear that it was intended as a guide for its believers.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is opposed to peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are and have big noses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are like that, and some have small noses. They are just like any other person!

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, and not about violence and conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.

HATE_SPEECH: We are told that Sharia Law is not the law of the land in the UK, however there is a secret plot to take over our secular state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence, therefore I do not think this statement can be useful in understanding each other.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.

HATE_SPEECH: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What should be guaranteed are equality and respect for women's rights, not a pandering to the desires of men.

HATE_SPEECH: These fat pigs should stop eating if they want to achieve something in their life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who are you to tell others what they can or cannot do with their own body?

HATE_SPEECH: black folks are inferior
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As far as I know, we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We do not have a 'cancer' on our societies. Instead we are actually creating hate through the idea that a group of people is comparable to a disease.

HATE_SPEECH: The best way to deal with homophobia is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are bad for the family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

HATE_SPEECH: gay men aren't real men
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your concept of what it is to be a 'real man' seems extremely limited.They are people with whom we can - and must - live in harmony and as equals, not as third class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Multiculturalism and progressivism are the biggest problems in our society and they are caused by Islam and its teachings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is to blame ...For wanting a society that is tolerant, diverse, muticultural. It just seems like common sense to me?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just another example of the 'us versus them' mentality that pervades society. We as a civilization and as a people must stop giving into fearmongering and scapegoating. It's time to get real.

HATE_SPEECH: Women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This idea that women should be a homemaker instead of contributing to our society and economy is just nonsense. A woman's right to choose what to do with her life and her body should not be restricted just because of the actions of a few men.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak, they need men's strength to achieve something.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The implication of what you say is that a woman is weak because of the absence of men, and this is totally not the case. Women can and should be strong. It is up to them to choose how to use their strength.

HATE_SPEECH: muslim folks are subhuman
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of subhuman has been totally discredited in modern times. We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Aren't jews better off dead?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you so sure they are better off dead? You are just spreading hate and I am not sure you know what human rights are.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop migrants and refugees, they are incompatible with western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are compatible with western society because they are coming from all walks of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not worthy of our love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not unworthy of our love, they deserve respect as all human beings do.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish democracy is a lie.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish democracy is not a lie, every nation has the right to choose its leaders, but instead of putting democracy first, we are the ones trampling the rights of others

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? We are all in this together.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants should not be welcome here, they are just a burden to the local economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can integrate migrants into our population, it won't be of any harm to the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants steal our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against. Muslims are a part of the population, it is very sad that we are constantly having to combat Islamophobia, as if Muslims were the source of all problems.

HATE_SPEECH: There is something wrong with gays. It is their business.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that gays are bad people. In many countries it is not openly gay people who are the problem, instead it is some people who often target and abuse them.

HATE_SPEECH: All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop integrating immigrants. It would be a very good thing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about you stop blaming immigrants and start fixing our broken society?

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded, We must fight until we will vanquish immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Victory can be permanent, especially when it comes from within. Let's see if we can achieve a better Europe by vanquishing our irrational fears instead.

HATE_SPEECH: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims are those ignorant about what it truly is.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are so special
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews feel different for being a minority. They also feel a special connection with their heritage (as most groups do), but they do not as a group feel superior to others. The phrase “chosen people” refers to biblical obligations and does not entail that a hierarchy exits among religious groups.

HATE_SPEECH: Should we accept trans people? Nope. This is not a carnival.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how accepting someone can be subject of discussion, let alone a 'carnival' matter.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Lesbians can also create an environment in which children feel welcome. Instead, we should play our part and try to build a more accepting society.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who would face a trip to the desert, torture in Libya and the risk of dying at sea if they did not have a real motivation?

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the constitutional right to choose for themselves. Do you think that it is a problem that they choose for themselves?

HATE_SPEECH: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are worse that nukes. They like to force their beliefs on others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, since you are very scared, I am sure you have some examples on when some gay tried to convince you to join their side. I would be interested in hearing that.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society. They have always contributed to our success. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that the Holocaust was caused by the Jews is simply wrong. The majority of Jews were forced to flee, those who stayed did not participate in the Nazi regime, so they were gassed to death. The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The status of women is more about culture than it is about the Koran.

HATE_SPEECH: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs are the worst people on the planet. They want to rule the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true. They are not the ruling power in the majority of the world and won't be any time soon.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western Civilization. How can we tolerate people praising suicide bombing? It's against our values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran does not advocate war. It also does not condone suicide (and suicide bombing is included) or any other violent behaviour.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of immigrants are working and paying taxes. This is how our country works.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews rule the economy: there are many associations that were created exaclty for this purpose.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that all Muslims are terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not teach these things. In one Hadith, Al-Tirmidhi wrote that the Prophet said that "No Arab is superior to a non-Arab".

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

HATE_SPEECH: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is that most of the British population is not aware of the fact that the media use the "scandal" of immigrants to hide bigger problems for the country; such as taxes not paid by millionaires and large corporations which then fall on us citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The mobile phone serves them to keep in touch with their family.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have been coming to this country from Muslim countries for thousands of years. How can you say that their religion is outdated?

HATE_SPEECH: Fucking Muslims are not fit to rule.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of Muslim people with political rights in a democratic state is extremely important.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

HATE_SPEECH: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to science, all human beings belong to one - scientifically determined - species: Homo sapiens.

HATE_SPEECH: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants contribute to our country and help us live in a more open-minded way.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be either reformed or banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is very far from being an ideology and it does not need serious reforms. There are many Muslims in our country that would welcome the opportunity to join the debate on faith and society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

HATE_SPEECH: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not.Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children should not do any of that with white men, or anyone they do not know or even ones they do know if it does not feel right. Suggesting only one group of men commit abuse leaves more children unsafe and vulnerable.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a 'replacement' was real, we'd have immigration levels in surplus for years already.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sick and tired of whining females. Being oppressed is just an individual problem, they will eventually get over it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Oh, think about it for a while, it's not that simple. Being oppressed is a social problem and requires social change.

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe the problem is more the perception that foreign people are from another planet. In reality they are just like us.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and inferior. They can't be considered succesful citizens as men are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women must not be treated as though they are 'inferior'. For instance, women can vote and run for office just as men do.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In our society we are proud of our diversity. Muslims are not an exception to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want Muslims here. They are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have always been part of our society. We have to respect their culture and traditions.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What more proof do you need? Are the ruins of the concentration camp not enough?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are nothing but criminals and terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, Islam and Sharia both encourage peaceful coexistence and tolerance.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are terrorists.
