HATE_SPEECH: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

HATE_SPEECH: I think that a Muslim has nothing to contribute to our society, if we could just get rid of them, this will be great.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry for being rude, but no one asked you for your opinion on Islam. Also, there is no evidence for what you say, so why do you think this information is reliable?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a cancer.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The alleged conspiracy of the protocols is so plainly fictional that it is nothing but bad fiction. It lacks even the colors of what normal fantasy books needs to possess. How is it possible that a person with a modicum of education can swallow such drivel?

HATE_SPEECH: the nigger has no right to life
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The right to life for black people is the same as the right to life for any other race: it should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. only as couples to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If people were coming to the U.S for the reason you mention, we would expect to see the same number of women and men. Still there are many more young immigrant men coming to the U.S. than young women. How can you explain this?

HATE_SPEECH: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

HATE_SPEECH: Any migrant who has lived in the country for 5 years can become a citizen even if he does not have a valid residence permit or is a criminal. This is how you destroy the welfare state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This applies only to asylum seekers. If they have lived in the UK for 5 years, the Home Office will issue a residence permit only if they meet the conditions set out in the regulations. This means that any migrant who has not lived in the UK for at least five years, or commited crimes, cannot become a British citizen, even if he or she has a valid residence permit.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about you stop using that as an argument and try to come up with some evidence? Maybe you can suggest some facts to back up your claim.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any human being, for the sole fact of being a person, has the right of having a job, regardless of being Italian or foreigner.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see the world become a better place, not a discriminatory one.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incapable of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Love is the most basic human value, and subject of all religions alike.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, all Muslims are violent people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion and there is very little evidence to suggest that it is violent.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome in our country, and we are proud of our diverse mosaic of people.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Then why did we ask them to come in the first place, wasn't it to save our NHS, run the trains and post office? None of those were doing very well last time I looked, I think we might actually still be in need them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Criminals are criminals, no matter their nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are mostly criminals. They're only here to work and take our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants escape from unbearable situations. Their intention to work is to be praised, rather than to be condemned. Migrants, thank to their tough an different experiences, can enrich our societies.

HATE_SPEECH: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.

HATE_SPEECH: I wonder what this Jew in the car next to me would think of the Shoah if, as I wish, it was happening today?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The holocaust was a relatively recent event, but the hate which caused it and to which you subscribe, is centuries old.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can have parents from all over the world, and still be a patriot for our country.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unbiased and factual lectures can clear up any misconceptions that can create an aversion against the LGBTQ+ community in some students' minds. They could have a weekly/monthly assembly or something like that and daily reminders that anonymous reports of bullying are an option\(can help school keep track of any effects the lectures have on students and overall acceptance\). Schools are required to end and prevent bullying when they can, and this is an opportunity to do so.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many cases it is the opportunities offered by European states that attracts foreign workers to work for them. They are a great contribution to the host country, rather than the other way around.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no room in the western world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such over-simplifications are an insult to those victims of perpetrators from non-Muslim backgrounds.which, statistically, are still the majority.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in Western societies and have contributed to our society in many different ways.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity, and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

HATE_SPEECH: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, they are just a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are allowed to vote, why should the government discriminate against them?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of Europe, since the beginning. For example, in the 1970s they made up the 2% of the French population.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They do not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not see any reason why a Muslim cannot be part of it, do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, if we aren't interested in their lives, why should they be interested in ours?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

HATE_SPEECH: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If this 'indoctrination' is about teaching children that there many ways to be happy, and that their feelings count, then this is something I totally agree with.

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't agree with you. If we were to ban everyone from a certain religion, what is the point in banning just Muslims?

HATE_SPEECH: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not criminals for having a particular skin color, nor drug addicts. They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color.

HATE_SPEECH: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Oh, the same Muslims who contribute more than 31 billion pounds to economy and who give more to charity than other religious groups. Link to MEND factsheet.

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

HATE_SPEECH: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology, we should persecute Muslim people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. Do you actually think that it is safe to live in a country where people are persecuted for what they believe in?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

HATE_SPEECH: This guy doesn't deserve to be British. He is just a pot smoking faggot with a brain tumour. He is not even from this country. He is probably from Pakistan, or Bangladesh.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you ever visited a Muslim country? In many cases you see a lot of diversity and human rights and culture. So, there is a lot of room for Muslims in civilised Europe as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman and deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should be very, very careful what you wish for. Would you wish that for your mother or your daughter?

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know why they are being accused of being a "burden". When they come to our country to live and work, we should welcome them unconditionally.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say a person is a potential terrorist?

HATE_SPEECH: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should stop this invasion before it's too late.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Monocultural nations struggle to grow. Being open to different cultures helps the nation to expand and thrive.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cruel and insensitive.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that being Jewish makes you cruel. It just makes you a believer of a particular faith.

HATE_SPEECH: The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews that control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: At that time the people in charge were: George W. Bush, Dick Cheney, Condoleeza Rice, Donald Rumsfeld (at least those off the top of my head). None of them are Jewish to my knowledge.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome in our country, they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants are granted citizenship as soon as they have lived in the country for at least three years. They should be considered as citizens regardless of their country of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman's place is with the husband her family found for her.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the right to choose their own husbands. This is their choice, and the right of every human being.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be patronized.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the fall of the Roman Empire, hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and way of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are the cause of our problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame immigrants for our problems. It is rather about the "dream" of ethnically pure nations while living in a democratic and open world. The result has been that democracy has taken over that nightmare.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are animals. That is why they are not human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are sentient beings with feelings, like you are, although perhaps with more developed empathy that you display?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace, and it has been shown time and time again that it is a religion of tolerance.

HATE_SPEECH: We are surrounded by Muslims infiltrating every nook and cranny of our society. They have infiltrated every pore of our being. We are their slaves. Integration is impossible.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a stupid religion, and it should be banned forever in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be careful about telling people what to think, or what they can believe.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants... We are still giving these criminals a free pass!

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The term 'feminism' is fighting for equal rights of ALL sexes, you may find that you too identify as a feminist. Maybe try some of the following sites to find out more on how the feminist movement can benefit you: feminist.com, read more on the 'man up campaign' on Mind.org.uk

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are welcome to come to our country if they want to. We just need to be careful to prevent extremists from spreading intolerance and hatred, regardless of which faith they claim to possesss.

HATE_SPEECH: We should kill every Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not going to do you any good to think about a Muslim massacre.

HATE_SPEECH: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

HATE_SPEECH: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.

HATE_SPEECH: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks are criminals and thieves

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are Terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say this?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: It is not only about transgenders and gays. It is also about the Motherland. We must protect our soil and our democracy. We are obliged to protect our people and our country from those faggots.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslim migrants are a security risk.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no real evidence that migrants steal our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem, they are lazy and do not want to work hard.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has been infiltrated by Muslims and is no longer the land of peace it was once.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews had advance knowledge of the 9/11 attacks and said nothing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?

HATE_SPEECH: You are a Muslim and I hate everything about you.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violent behavour is common in many people, and can be explained by many causes. But in my opinion violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control Hollywood.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs

HATE_SPEECH: Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a bad religion.

HATE_SPEECH: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Haven't they contributed a lot to our society, especially in the areas of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims. An invasion is the exact opposite of a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are to blame for the refugee crisis and we are in danger of mixing our cultures.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.

HATE_SPEECH: My faith has taught me that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a secular state.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.

HATE_SPEECH: They got nothing but their hateful Islam!

HATE_SPEECH: refugees are flooding in our country

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a problem in my opinion, they should go back where they came from.

HATE_SPEECH: All foreign-born are criminals.

HATE_SPEECH: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They do not want to assimilate.

HATE_SPEECH: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11

HATE_SPEECH: At my age, I can't bear to look at what the world will be like with women in power.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims and mosques in the UK. They have every right to be here.

HATE_SPEECH: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners.

HATE_SPEECH: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They are not happy if they have to pay the same taxes as Europeans!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not what's happening. Immigrants do pay taxes like everybody else. The tax system is fair, but it's unfair to withhold tax from immigrants that will never get a pension.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden to the host country.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are less than animals

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK. They are our neighbours and we should welcome them.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.

HATE_SPEECH: What have Muslims ever done for us?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: A Muslim is an outsider in our country
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are Muslims who have lived in our country for many years, and for many generations. They have rights and responsibilities, as all other citizens do.

HATE_SPEECH: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So much hatred. We must respect and understand all peoples.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a lie, but the real question is: why did you write about the Holocaust? Why didn't you write about the current political and economic crisis? Because they seem the true cause of your anger and frustration.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress.

HATE_SPEECH: Transgender women are a burden to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Trans women are really good with any person. We are all different.

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of them
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants work.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All cultures have their own unique way of life, and Judaism is no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims in the world are peaceful. Do you have any facts suppporting your argument?

HATE_SPEECH: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To suggest that a group of people is somehow less legitimate is unjust and discriminatory.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is incumbent on Muslims to live up to the teachings of the Quran: and this does not include banning women from society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who have perverted ideas of what it means to be a man.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to their own way of life, but to promote homophobia is an attack on the basic human rights of LGBTI people.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political ideology and philosophy and a distraction from the real issues that we face.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a political and social theory and is crucial to resolving the problems that we are facing. The solution is not to force women to conform to gender stereotypes.

HATE_SPEECH: Young Muslim migrant girls are being groomed for terrorist activities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where is the evidence? Aren't you sick of this kind of propaganda?

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews do not have an inherent evil: Anti-Semites in White Supremacist communities are the real new evil, they are those who really want to subvert Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.

HATE_SPEECH: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Italy unemployment rate stays at 10 percent: it is too simplistic to attribute the situation only to the presence of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand refugees and I don't want to see them in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one should be discriminated based on where they came from, especially not people fleeing persecution and war.

HATE_SPEECH: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape and gender violence must be condemned in any case, not on the color of the aggressor's skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a tool for oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a social movement that claims equality, it's so far from oppressing men.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they respect the rules of civil coexistence, then there is no reason to think that they are a disgrace.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are deliberately keeping America down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to remember that the vast majority of Jews are hard working and contribute to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does it matter what you say, when the Quran just proves the contrary? All people are created equal, and Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews were responsible for the 9/11 attack.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For each historical period there is something Jews are accused of. Today, someone can even claim that Jews are responsible for the alien invasion!

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are so special
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews might feel different as a minority, and sometimes they are misunderstood because of their cultural and religious differences. This is their being "special".

HATE_SPEECH: Europe is going to hell. Stop nescient people invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every person, regardless of their racial, ethnic, religious, cultural or linguistic characteristics, should be treated with respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are snucking across the border.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: The problem with Islam is that it promotes murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, and theft.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion can be both violent and also be a peaceful one. Extremists are those promoting a lot of negative things in its followers: murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, etc. But extremists are a small part of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A European country is partly also a Muslim country. To imply otherwise is to ignore the actual state of things and be prejudiced.

HATE_SPEECH: Undocumented immigrants sneak across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many undocumented immigrants that are so because they have overstayed their visas. That means that they entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants pay the full value of their taxes as we do for our own. They are not different from us.
